1.content:
To start with, you should meet the five heroes you can choose to be;

Knight: A warrior who is exceptionally skilled with a sword and shield. he also can use a crossbow. mainly wears mail armor.

Thorne: A gladiator who Knight saved from the arena. main weapons of choice are a trident and a net, though he can use a sword and a sling. wears gladiator armor over a cloth tunic.

Arthur: A Mage with power over the elements. uses magic to fight, though he can use his staff if close range combat is called for. mainly wears a cloth robe.

Emily: A Thief who excels in agility, using this to deadly use when fighting. fights with a dagger. wears light armor (think Cheetara from the 2011 version of Thundercats)

Blair: a ranger who uses a bow with deadly accuracy, but she can fight with a sword and dagger at close range. mainly wears leather armor over her clothing.

now that you know who there is, choose which one you would like to be, and let the adventure in Avara begin
1.title: the 5 heroes

11.content:
You awaken in a small room lined with bunk beds. There are a few people sleeping but for the most part the room is empty. You can tell by the gentle rocking of the room that you are on a boat. You slowly climb out of your bed and head up onto the deck. You immediately spot your friends among the crowd and head over to them.

"Oh good your awake, we are almost there" Emily tells you.

You look over the horizon and see Avara in the distance. In no time the ship lands in a small town called Bowerstone. Your name is knight. You and your group of friends are some of the best fighters you have ever come across. You are are a extremely friendly person who might be a little to ticklish for his own good. You just want to have a good time and become rich and famous. You grew up in the kings guard as a child and moved up the ranks until you became the kings personal guard.

Everything was going great until you were given a mission to execute a gladiator who seemed unkillable. This man did nothing wrong but fight for his life and you could not bring yourself to do it. Instead you freed him and fled the country. On your way you met Arthur, Emily, and Blair. You have only known them for a short period of time but became fast friends.

You leave the ship and head into town. Your then....
11.title: Knight

choices: Approach the man about the treasure
111.content:
Needing a place to start you decide to head to the local tavern. While there you can find a room to stay in, talk to some of the locals, and possible search for some work. It is the perfect place to start. You walk in the door and look around. The tavern is almost completely deserted. The only people you see are the bartender, the waitress, and a man passed out at one of the tables. You approach the bartender.

"Good evening sir, my name is Knight and I am looking for a room to stay in for a couple of days" you tell the bartender.
"Well we have a room for rent if you have the coin" the bartend responds
"I'm a little short on money right now. Is their any way I can pay for it later?"
"Well......" the bartender looks you over "I usually don't do this but you look like a trustworthy man. We have a vacant room upstairs. Its fairly small but it has a bed and a dresser for your things"
"Sounds good to me. I cant tell you how much I appreciate this and after I find a job you will be rewarded greatly" you tell the man. He hands you the key.

You order a beer and talk with the bartender for a bit when the man who was asleep at the table approaches the bar area. He orders a beer and sits next to you.
"Rough night" you ask him
"You could say that. I was following a lead on some treasure"
"Treasure hunter? You sound like my kind of man"
"Yea well I was not the only one. I was a couple miles out of town when I was ambushed by a woman. Before I knew what hit me I was knocked to the ground and tied to a tree. She then proceeded to interrogate me about all of the information I knew about the treasure"
"Interrogated. I don't see a scratch on you"
"She just did ok I does not matter how"
"Come on it could not have been that bad, just tell me"
The man starts to blush "Fine, she tickled me"
"She tickled you? You let a little girl tickle you" you tease him.
"Yea its really embarrassing but she tickled me, I eventually passed out and when I awoke I was laying outside of this pub"
"Wow that's quite a story"

The bar starts to get more crowded and the man starts chatting it up with some random girls. You are sitting alone for a while when all of a sudden you hear a woman behind you. "Anyone sitting here" you turn and see the waitress standing behind you. She is a short, skinny girl with blond hair and is very attractive. "Go right ahead" you tell her. You chat with her for a while when the conversation between you and the man comes up.

"Yea he was tickle tortured by a woman" you say
"That sounds awful" she says to you
"Come on its just tickling. It cant be that bad"
"I don't know. I'm a expert tickler. I bet I could make you talk"
"I don't think so"

She moves in close and you think she is going to kiss you when all of a sudden her hands start digging into your sides. You try stop her but her hands are too fast. You end up falling off of your stool laughing.

"Just tickling hu?" she says smiling "Well I have to get back to work. We should do this again sometime" She winks at you.
"Im free tomorrow" you tell her while climbing up off the ground.
"Its a date" she says to you. She then walks away.

You decide that you have had enough fun for now and decide to.....
111.title: Head to the bar

1111.content: Feeling the tolls of the day, you head upstairs to you small room and jump in the bed. Even with the lumpy, hard bed you manage to fall asleep almost immediately. You are woken up by a strange voice hours later. You must not have been asleep very long because the moon is still high in the sky and it is still dark out. The candles in your room have all been lit by the unknown intruder. You look around the room to see where the sound came from and you see.....
1111.title: Head to bed

11111.content:
You are startled when you see a person sitting in the corner of the room. From head to toe they are covered in black leather clothing. Their face is covered by a black mask and all you can see is their eyes through the eye holes in the mask. They sit silently staring at you. Not knowing what to do, you decide to speak up.

"Who are you and what are you doing in my room?" you ask the unknown intruder.
"Straight to the point I like that" you hear a woman's voice respond.

Her playful tone makes you uneasy. She does not speak anymore but just sits there staring at you. After a staring contest that seems to go on for ages, you decide to act. You don't know what this person wants, but you don't want to stick around to find out. You stand up and slowly walk towards the door. As soon as you touch the door knob you hear her speak again.

"I would not do that if I were you" she responds still in her playful tone.

She is still sitting in the chair in the corner of the room. There is no way she can catch you before you can reach a guard. You decide to go for it. You turn the knob, open the door, and start to run down the hall. You only go a couple of feet before you are grabbed from behind and thrown back into the room. The door closes behind you. You look in the corner of the room and see that she has not moved from her chair.

You look back at the door and see that there is now a second person standing there. They are dressed exactly like the first intruder. They block the door, your only escape, and you soon realize that you may have to fight your way out of here. You look around for your sword but it is not where you left it.

"Don't worry you will get your weapon back when we are done" she says sounding a lot more serious this time. "Now will you please take a seat so we can do this in a civilized manner" she says pointing to the chair at the other end of the table. Seeing as how you have no weapons and are outnumbered you listen to her.

"Thank you now we have a proposition for you. We are members of a secret organization who specializes in stealth and martial arts. We are assassins and thieves who work to keep the world balanced. When one empire becomes too powerful we destroy them. When one kingdom is on the verge of collapse we save them. When one man has to much money we take it and distribute it to the poor. We have been watching you ever since you saved the innocent gladiator from the corrupt king. We see great potential in you.

"How did you know who I am? I made a clean getaway" you question the girl

"We see all and know all. Our power spreads throughout the entire kingdom. No one can hide from us. Now the question is do you want to fight for good? We will not make you come with us. If you decide to pass up on our offer we will leave and you will never see us again."

You think long and hard and decide to......
11111.title: An unknown person

1113.content:
You walk over to the treasure hunter who is now sitting down at a table by himself. He stares of into the distance as he sips on the bottle of rum in the hand. The smell of alcohol fills your nostrils as you approach him and it is blatantly obvious that he is quite drunk. You take a seat in the empty chair on the other side of the table.

"So this treasure you were going after, how big is the prize?" you ask the man. The man snaps out of his trance and stares at you. He does not respond right away and you start to wonder if he even heard your question when all of a sudden he answers. "It is so big that you would not have to do another job for years" he says enthusiastically, however his tone soon turns from enthusiasm to depression as he continues his sentence. "There is no way I am going after that treasure with that maniac on the lose though".

"Does this mean that you would not mind me taking a shot at it?" you ask the man. Again he sits there in silence for a moment. You are not sure if he is thinking it over, or if in his drunken stupor he is trying to comprehend what you said. "I will tell you everything about the treasure on one condition. If you manage to fund the treasure, I get 20 percent of the loot" he tells you. Thinking it over, you decide that this is more than fair and you agree. He pulls out a map from his back pocket and hands it over to you.

"I managed to hide this from the woman when I was being interrogated. Follow this and it will lead you right to the treasure" he tells you. You shake his hand and start to head out of the bar when all of a sudden......
1113.title: Approach the man about the treasure

112.content:
"Ok well we are almost out of cash so I think we should split up and look for jobs" you tell the group. They all agree with you and you guys part ways. With your many years of guard duty, you decide the town guard would be a good starting point. You approach a guard in the market place and he points you towards the town barracks.

You enter the barracks and see a couple of guards who are sleeping, but for the most part it is empty. You head through a second door in the back that leads to a outdoor courtyard where most of the men are practicing with their bows and swords.

"No Civilians allowed in the barracks. Leave at once" you hear from behind you. You spin around and notice a large looking man. He is wearing nicer armor than the rest of the men and you assume he is some higher ranking guard.

"I was actually wondering if you had a position open" You tell him. "In the town that I came from I was part of the royal guard". The man looks you over for a minute then responds.

"Well we do have a position open" he responds "Show me what you got" hey throws you a sword and leads you over to a solider standing in the middle of the courtyard. "Rex this is Knight. Knight, this is Rex our newest recruit. I want the two of you to fight with each other" He steps back and the two of you draw your swords. Rex immediately charges at you but you hold your ground. As soon as he is within your range, you immediately disarm him.

"Wow not your first time with a sword I see" he says seeming impressed. "Now how are you with a bow". He leads you over to the archery range. You pick up the bow and shoot. You hit the target all three shots. "Not to bad" the guard says "I think we will be able to find a place for you. My name is Capitan Hadrian and you will report to me. You are one of the best swordsman I have ever come across and I think it would be a waste of talent to have you as a regular guard. I want you to....
112.title: Join the guards

choices: She heads out for a walk
1121.content:
"Protect the princess" the Captain tells you

"Seems easy enough" you tell him.

"Its not as easy as you would think. You see the princess is a very independent person and hates having a guard on her. Because of this we have had 10 guards request a transfer this month. She constantly tries to run away from them or persuade them to leave her. Were not exactly sure how, the guards refused to talk about it, but she has gotten very good at it. Hopefully you have the skills and the wits to outsmart her and protect her" The Capitan explains to you as you walk down the street to the palace. You enter a door and are now standing in a large hallway. "Oh yea if you lose the princess, you will be sentenced to 2 hours in the stocks. Because you are a town guard the punishment will not be very severe and the town will go easy on you but you must be put in them all the same"

"Well hopefully it will not come to that" you tell him.

He leads you into a large room at the end of the hallway and you see the princess sitting on a throne across the room.

"Your Highness this is Knight, your new protector" the Capitan introduces you. She dismisses the Capitan and he leaves the room.

"What makes you think that you are worthy to protect me. I have outwitted or persuaded every single guard that the Capitan has thrown at me. I don't need a protector and would most likely do better protecting myself than you ever would" she tells you.

"With all do respect I think that I am more than capable to do the job. I have been protecting royal families all of my life without a singe incident"

"Well see" she says with a menacing grin on her face.

You stand guard for a while when.....
1121.title: Protect the princess

choices: Stay! She may beat you in battle, but you have a job to do!
Maybe there's another job you can do for the Princess?
11212.content:
Seeing that you have no intention of listening to the rumors and leaving when asked, the Princess spoke again.

"Perhaps it would be best if I tried a new approach this time. Tell me, Knight, how skilled are you with melee weapons?" She asked, stroking her chin a bit. This close to her, you notice something a bit strange- it's hard to judge due to her green dress, but...she seemed rather...toned. Not overtly powerful, more like she wasn't fragile. However, having been asked a question, you chuckle and shrug.

"Well, Princess..."

"...You don't know my name?...You must be new to the Kingdom. Here, royalty by tradition have names based on colors, with the highest ranking nobles- my family, naturally- being green. Mine is Verde." She replied with a chuckle, before letting you speak again.

"Right, Princess Verde, I'd have no way to truly gauge my skill, though the guard captain says he finds me impressive with the blade." You say truthfully. The Princess seems to look you over for a bit, before speaking.

"Right then...follow me." She waves you towards her, and leads you through the halls and rooms of the castle. There are many banners of different colors, but all seem to have a particular design on them. At last, she takes you up a small flight of stairs, leading to the second floor, before bringing you to the tower. The castle was large; you had seen this tower on your way here, and could guess you had been pretty close to it within the castle when you met the princess, but this walk alone took five minutes! At last, however, you walked into her room...And were shocked.

In her room, on one side, was a beautiful balcony with banners galore and all manner of plants. There was, inside, a wonderfully huge, comfy bed, multiple tables and dressing rooms...and at one side, what looked like a miniature dojo.

"Father likes keeping this a secret. He understands women can be just as powerful, if not moreso, than men, but feels a princess must use her wits and diplomacy to show strength. Of course, it doesn't hurt when his daughter also happens to favor the spear...or the fist...or the trident...Or, my personal favorite..." She walked into her little dojo, taking a lightweight axe out of a cupboard. "The axe. So, I want to see how skilled you are. Don't worry about hurting me. I have plenty of potions for healing injuries in here as well."

You weren't given a chance to protest; everything you did to dissuade her fell on deaf ears.

And that's why you found yourself, three minutes later (Two and half arguing, the last thirty seconds having your butt handed to you) on the ground, a victorious princess Verde in front of you. "Still think I need protecting?" She asked in a singsong voice. "If you stay, I can always find a new way to make you leave." She said.

Do you take this as a challenge?
11212.title: Princess Badass

choices: Dive through the broken window and chase the princess on your own
Get taken to the town stocks as punishment
11213.content:
You've been standing guard outside the large room for a a few hours into the night when you hear the crash of breaking glass and a shrill scream. Kicking the door open, you see a woman in dark maroon and black armor, her face obscured by a hood. She is pressing a sponge soaked in something to the princess's face. It must be some sort of potion, as the princess is already unconscious. The woman must be a kidnapper or a assassin, but working for who you can't guess. You draw your iron sword and point the tip at the kidnapper.

"Stop immediately and unhand the princess!", you shout. Hopefully other guards have heard the commotion. The woman turns rapidly, and throws a probably poisoned dart at you, which misses your head by and inch. With a growl, you spin your sword at her, but the mysterious kidnapper catches your wrist and deftly disarms you. She then pounces on you, and tries to knock you out with the same potion. The sponge hovers inches from your face.

You almost push it back at her, but unexpectedly the woman digs her fingers into your horribly ticklish sides and armpits! You shriek and let her go. The sponge slaps you in the face and you feel woozy as the potion take effect. The last thing you see before the potion takes effect is her carrying the princess out through the broken window.

An hour later the Captain and other guards wake you. You tell them about what happened and together you deduce that the kidnapper must have been working for another kingdom. Before you can leave two guards grab you and then you remember the punishment for losing the princess: time in the stocks!
11213.title: You hear a noise outside

112131.content:
Normally you would except your fate, however you are the princess's best hope for rescue so you do the unthinkable. You leap out of the window and go on the run. Once you find the princess you will come back and take you punishment, but there are more important things to do right now. The guard try and come after you but you are much faster, much smarter, and much stronger than they are and you easily elude them.

Now that you have escaped you have to figure out how to track the princess. You did notice some hoof prints near the window of the castle. It is likely that the attacker was riding on horse back so you figure this is a pretty strong lead. On the other hand, you might be able to get some help from Emily who is an expert tracker.
112131.title: Dive through the broken window and chase the pr...

choices: Something or someone leaps out of the forest and surprises you
You exit the thickest part of the woods
1121311.content:
Emily might be a master tracker, but with every minute the person who captured the princess gets farther and farther away. Besides, it's possible Emily would turn you in to the guards. You turn and run to the stables near by, and grab Swift, the aptly named fastest horse in the kingdom. Without paying the stable owner you mount his saddle and gallop into the forest, making sure to keep a close eye on the horse tracks.

You continue your journey through the forest when...
1121311.title: Follow the prints

11213112.content:
After a long journey through the forest you start to see an opening. As you enter the opening, the moonlight eliminates the ground and you see that you are in a large field used for cattle. Although a few cows are roaming the outskirts of the field, most of them are asleep meaning these fresh horse tracks are your kidnapper.

You climb off of your horse and examine the tracks. They are fresh meaning you are getting closer. You hop back on your horse and continue across the field. As you cross over a small hill you see a small cottage. Tied in front of the cottage is a horse tied to the stable. You can just make out a shadow carrying something over their shoulder into the house.

"The Princess!" you shout out loud. You have found her! You dismount your horse and rush down the path to the house. Just as you are about to break down the door a thought occurs to you. Maybe this is a trap. You have to think about this for a minute. Although time is a factor here, you are no good to the princess dead.

You have two option. Option one is to climb onto the roof and sneak down the chimney. Although this may take some time, you are sure to get into the house undetected. Your second option is to break down the front door. Although you will definitely be caught, you will get there faster and with your superior sword fighting skills you can probably apprehend the criminal.
11213112.title: You exit the thickest part of the woods

choices: You land softly in the firepit
112131121.content: Seeing as how the princess is in the house, you don't want it to turn into a hostage situation. "Down the chimney I go" you think to yourself as you creep towards the house. You quietly scale the rooftop and walk over to the chimney. Looking down you, all you see is darkness and you start to wonder whether this is a good idea. Your sense of adventure gets the better of you and you start your decent.
112131121.title: Down the Chimney

choices: A finger glides across your foot
A whisker glides across your armpit
1121311212.content:
The chimney is slick from the rain, making your mission all the harder. The sides of the chimney are difficult to grip and on more than one occasion your feet slip and you have to grip the walls with all of your might to keep yourself from plummeting to the fire pit below. Just as you are starting to wonder whether you should head back up and go through the front door, your foot slips again and this time you are not so lucky. As you try to grip the walls of the chimney, your hand slide off like butter and gravity pulls you towards the ground.

"Ouch!" you mutter as your hips get wedged in the walls. The cool breeze near your bare feet let you know that you are near the end of the chimney, however you seem to be stuck just feet above the ground. You try and wiggle with all your might to wedge yourself free, but it is no use and you are stuck fast.

"Of course! Down the chimney, What a brilliant idea!" you mutter to yourself. As you your mind races for a solution out of this mess. You cant go back up with your feet unable to grip the edges of the wall, and you cant go down with your waist wedged in like this. You could yell but the only person home is a criminal and a hostage so that is probably not the best idea.

As your mind races to find a way out of this mess.........
1121311212.title: A have some issues

11213112122.content:
You try and wiggle your way out of the chimney, but you are trapped, and you are not getting out of this by yourself. You sit there for a couple moments, and contemplate your options. "Lets see, I can yell for help, but that means alerting myself to the kidnapper. I could hide here and hope someone else comes along, but who knows how long that will take. I could also....." you train of thought gets cut off as you feel something brush against your bare armpit.

And then it happens again, and again. The you hear a very faint squeal. MICE! The cold nose of a mouse digs into your armpit, investigating this new human in its home. The whiskers keep brushing your armpits, and you have to fight with all of your might to keep yourself from laughing. A small snort escapes your mouth, and you bite your lip, trying to keep quiet.

The mouse, not realizing he is driving you insane, keep crawling around, his whiskers dragging along your armpits and sides in the process. You start feeling the familiar feeling on your other side, and the realization that there are multiple mice in the chimney frightens you. You are starting to think that you can get through this just fine, when one of the mice sticks his nose in your belly button, causing you to thrash about in the chimney.

To your astonishment, even with you bucking back and forth, and wanting to laugh like a school girl, you manage to keep completely silent. Your movement, however, did not go unnoticed as more mice come to investigate. Their whiskers start dragging along your belly, down your legs, and against your ears. The increasing amount of ticklers makes it incredibly hard to keep your quiet.

As the mice near your belly digs into your belly button again, you can no longer take it and you scream out in laughter. "Hahahahah stahahahahaha". No longer caring if anybody can hear you, you start screaming for help. That is when you hear someone walk towards the chimney.

"So you thought you could sneak in a get the princess back hu?" the voice says "Well I think..."
11213112122.title: A whisker glides across your armpit

choices: The two guards don't find anything and leave soon after.
You feel someone's fingers through the side of the bag
112131121221.content:
"Hmmm..." The voice thinks to herself. She reaches up one sharp-nailed finger and touches your sole. She laughs, delighted by your reaction as you squirm your toes. "Unfortunately, much as I'd love to play with you my master would be verrrry displeased if I were to arrive late. See you later, 'hero'."

You can hear her footsteps get more distant, and it sounds like she's walking down a flight of stairs while simultaneously effortlessly carrying the princess. Very strange. After you can't hear the princess's struggling anymore, you decide the coast is clear. Your encounter with the mice managed to inch you down the chimney until you'd almost reached the bottom, so a bit more struggling should do it- Bam!

Finally you fell out of the chimney and hit the ashes of the fireplace with an uncomfortable thump. You still have your sword and light armor, but your dignity has been lost forever. The inside of the house is sparsely decorated with cobwebbed wooden tables and chairs. A staircase leads to the basement, which you go into. The basement would look like a normal wine cellar if one of the wall casks hadn't been pried open to reveal a secret passage. This must be where the kidnapped brought the princess!

You follow the thin rock passage for many minutes, taking care not to bump your head on any loose stones or sharp rocks. As you walk downward and downward the rock turns darker and darker. Eventually it ends in a ladder, which you climb down. The ladder ends behind a stack of crates in some sort of storage room made completely out of black rock. You peer over the edge of one of the crates and - gasp- the doorway is guarded by two demon-like creatures with red eyes and skin! They're not armed as far as you can tell, though both are taller and more muscular than you. You doubt you could take them even with your sword since these subterranean creatures are rumored to be extremely strong and durable. Behind the doorway the hall splits into left and right.

One of them (a lightly armored man) speaks to the other, a female with breasts barely held back by her armored bra. "Where do you think she took the girl?"

"Like i know. She seemed pretty important, so probably not to the torture chambers. Maybe she's in a cell, or maybe one of the higher-ups wanted to see her Or even- Hey! Who's there?"

You seem to have bumped into one of the crates, which makes a slight banging noise. The woman starts towards where you are, but before she sees you you pull yourself into one of the room's large bags, which is thankfully empty. Now you just hope neither of them notice you...
112131121221.title: I will leave you be

choices: Disguise as a servant looking for work and trek to Calihar
Disguise as a foppish nobleman and walk to Calihar
1122.content:
..."to become a spy", Hadrian says. "You'd be well suited to the job with you quick blade skills and your ability with a bow. But there are other parts to being a spy besides fighting. You need to be able to keep your disguise, stay hidden if needed, and withstand any torture. Something tells me it would be better if you were trained by our resident spymaster, Athkela Vensani."

Athkela is a slight woman with cropped brown hair and green eyes, as well as a no-nonsense attitude. "Lets get started immediately", she says, as soon as you meet her. First she teaches you to not draw attention to yourself when disguised, and that a disguise as a servant, cook, or maid is less conspicuous. After a month you move to learning about hiding in the shadows, a skill spies share with assassins and thieves. Finally, she locks you to a table and gives you tips on withstanding torture. "You can use hidden pain softening potion tablets to help with physical torture, so the only thing you should watch out for is tickling." "Tickling?", you ask. "Yes, tickling", answers Athkela, and spiders her dark fingernails from your armpits to your belly. Surprised by the sudden tickling attack, you burst into laughter and attempt to wriggle free from your bonds. She continues her light torture on your underarms for several minutes before stopping when you are reduced to a panting mess.

"There's not much that can be done to stop a tickle attack, except heavy armor which would be of no use for a spy. Consider it a weakness and be wary at all times.", she reminds you.

The next week Hadrian orders you to enter the kingdom of Calihar, disguised as a humble servant, because the city had been receiving reports of hostility from Calihar.
1122.title: Become a spy

113.content: Since you are completely out of cash, looking for work is the first thing you need to take care of. You talk with a couple of the towns people and find out that the local blacksmith is currently hiring. Because you are so used to being in the military, it will be very different being a blacksmith but your here to make a fresh start. Why not try something new? You also overheard some people saying that one of the local farms needs a helping hand. This would not be a permanent job but it would help you make some quick cash. You could also head to the local pub and look for some more adventurous jobs.
113.title: Look for work

choices: I need you to deliever these
1131.content:
You decide that being a blacksmith is a good solid career so you decide to check it out. You don't have to walk far until you can smell the smoke and hear the sound of clanking metal. "Must be here" you think to yourself. You walk in to shop and the first thing you notice is that there are swords hanging everywhere. Daggers, Swords, Bows, they seem to have it all and more. You look to your left and see a pair of stocks sitting on the ground.

"May I help you" you hear a female voice coming from behind you. You turn around and are stunned. Standing behind the counter is a gorgeous girl. She has long black hair, is fairly short and skinny, but looks very fit.
"Um.... hi yea my name is Knight and I heard that you were looking for blacksmiths and I was wondering if I could talk to the owner" you ask her.
"Your talking to her" she responds
"Oh sorry, Its just that most forges don't have woman owners"
"Don't worry about it. I get that all the time. My dad used to own the forge but he recently passed away and it was up to me to keep the forge up and running. We are in need of a Blacksmith. Do you have any qualifications?" she asks
"Well I have never worked in a forge but while I was guarding the king I would make my own armor and weapons"
"Well that sounds good enough to me. If you would like you can start right away"
"Sounds good"

For a couple of hours she shows you the ropes. She goes over things such as making swords, armor, and other things you already know how to make. "Hello, My name is Captain Pegason and I am the captain of the WestCliff Guards." the Captain calmly says to you. You are little taken back by his calm demeanor. "I hear that you got a little mixed up in one of my men's scouting runs"

"Scouting runs! They were Kidnapping innocent civilians!" you yell at him.

"This is true. We have been in a war with brownstone for 10 long years. We were scouting the wall for weaknesses when all of a sudden the town guards attacked my men. They managed to knock them out however a few civilians saw the struggle. We could not allow them to run and alert the guards so they ran and captured them. We were going to take them back here and use them to get our captured men back when you jumped in" the captain explains to you, still acting extremely calm. "Now I don't see you as a threat however I do have a war to win so I will need to get as much information as possible. However now is not the time or the place."

He gets up, grabs a hood, and throws it over your head. You are then untied from the chair and your hands are retied behind your back. You are then led out of the room. When you finally arrive at your destination you are.....
1142.title: Are in a Unfamiliar Kingdom

1143.content:
As you slowly awaken, you see two dark shadows standing above you. You vision becomes clearer as time passes and you can just make out the shadow closest to you. The first thing you notice about him is that he is definitely not a Bowerstone guard. Nor does he appear to be one of the attackers either. With his ragged clothing and his muscular figure you assume that he must be one of the kietelen tribe members, a local group of barbarians who run havoc on Bowerstone. Standing next to him is a girl who appears to be no older than twenty. She has long dark red hair and only wears brown breastplates and a matching tunic.

Even in your current predicament you have to admit she is a very attractive girl. You blush a little as you realize that you have been staring at her for some time now. You snap out of your trance and look back at the man who appears to be in charge. You wonder if he can speak English, and as if he could read your mind he starts talking.

"My name is koning. I am the leader of the kietelen tribe and you are now our slave. To own a slave in our tribe you must go out and capture them yourself. That is exactly what my daughter Plagan was doing when she saw you get knocked out by the attacking kingdom. Seizing the opportunity she acted quickly and drug you out of view before the town guards came running out of the gate. And I must say what a prize you will be" the chief says

You decide that fighting at this moment will do you no good and you remain silent. The woman leads you out of the tent and the two of you start walking through the camp. She keeps turning around and giggling with a large smirk on her face. It is not just her. Tribe members, slaves, merchants, it seems like every woman you come across has the same smirk on her face.

It is not until you look down at yourself that you realize you are completely nude! You face turns bright red and you attempt to cover yourself, but with your hands tied behind your back there is nothing you can do but blush as everyone laughs at your predicament. You continue to follow Plagan until you reach......
1143.title: Are in a Barbarian Villiage

choices: Get dressed and check things out
11432.content:
Until you reach the slave camp. There are, what appears to be hundreds of tents, surrounded by a barbwire fence. There is only one entrance and exit to the camp and it is through a large barbwire gate, guarded by the four meanest looking men you have ever seen. As you approach the gate Plagan tells the guards to open the gate and the two of you go into the camp, escorted by one of the guards.

Plagan leads you to a fairly large tent on the side of the camp. "This is where you will be sleeping" she tells you. You look inside of the tent and it has a queen sized bed inside of it, and a fire pit in the middle. You have to admit for being a slave, it is not a bad place to live. Plagan walks up to you and unties your wrists and feet. "You will find that we have top notch security here and escape is futile. I will give you a day to get acquainted with the other slaves and the area. tomorrow you start your duties. You will find clothing inside of your tent and food is on the other side of the camp. Welcome to your new life" she says before leaving with the guard.

"Well now time to scope out the area and see what I am up against" you think to yourself. "On the other hand, I could really use a nap"
11432.title: The Slave Camp

114321.content:
Not knowing if you will get free time like this again, you decide to make use of it. You head out of the tent and start walking the perimeter of the fence. For such a savage bunch of bandits, they really did a good job with this fence. The fence is tall and made out of large wooden logs. The top of the logs are spiked to deter anyone from trying to climb them.

There is one thing you did notice. Although the fence itself is quite large and secure, there are not a lot of personnel watching the slaves. The only men in the camp are at the front gate and they cant see most of the camp. You try pulling on some of the logs, but they were well built and they are not coming down. They are clearly too tall to climb over so you try and think of another way out of this mess.

You chat with a couple of slaves as you walk the perimeter. "This place is impenetrable", "There is no way out", "It is hopeless", You hear from slave after slave after slave. You start to think this is a lost cause until you talk to a elderly man. His story seems to be a little different from the others. "There is a legend of a man who attempted an escape once. No one knows how or if he made it out alive. All I can tell you is that the night he attempted to break free was the last night anyone ever saw him"

The man points you to the tent that he stayed in and then walks away.
114321.title: Get dressed and check things out

1143211.content:
You decide to check out the mans tent who disappeared. "It's worth a shot" you think to yourself. You start examining every nook and cranny of the tent and everything looks ordinary. You start to think this was a huge wast of time when all of a sudden you see something that catches your eye. The dirt in the fireplace appears to be a lot looser than the other ones you have seen. Almost like it was once dug up.

You start shoveling away dirt from the fireplace with your hands. It does not take long until you reach something hard with a handle on it. Pulling the handle as hard as you can, a large wooden board comes up, pulling the remaining dirt with it. You are now sitting in front of a large hole in the ground. Not knowing where it leads or even how deep it is you have a decision to make. Should you take a leap of faith?
1143211.title: Check out the tent

11432111.content:
"Anywhere is better than here!" you think to yourself as you jump down the hole in the ground. The hole is a lot more narrow than you anticipated and you can feel roots sticking out of the sides of the tunnel. They brush up against you as you fall faster and faster. You start to giggle as the roots brush up against some of your more sensitive areas. You try to bring your arms down to protect your belly and armpits however the tunnel is to narrow and they are stuck above your head.

As you fall faster, the roots grow more plentiful, and you start laughing harder. The roots brush up against your armpits, belly, ribs, feet, thighs, every exposed part of your body is being tormented by these terrible plants. Your giggles turn to laughs, and your laughs turn to howls as you fall deeper and deeper into the ground.

Then all of a sudden it all stops. The tickling sensation is replaced by a bone chilling wet feeling as you plummet into a body of water. As you surface you see that the cavern you have stumbled into is lit by torches on the wall, meaning that either these are magic torches, or that someone was recently here. Not knowing which one you would prefer, you try not to think about it too much.

You climb out of the water and look around. You seem to be in some sort of temple. You see a large staircase leading to a large wall covered in writing. You cautiously approach the wall and start reading it.

"You have taken a leap of faith, and here you stand."
"Your body weak, but on solid land"
"On your way down you were reckless and careless"
"But don't worry, try not to be Embarrassed"
"The way ahead, will surely tickle"
"But with no way back, you are in quite the pickle"
"So bear the road, and do your best"
"For to survive, you must pass this test"
"And because your pants were snagged on the fall"
"I can now see, your friend is so small"
"And now that your little friend has been observed"
"I have decided, a little embarrassment is deserved"
"But remember this warning and you will be fine"
"And once again, you will see the sun shine"

The first thing you do is look down at yourself and sure enough, you are yet again naked. And you are a little embarrassed that the writing on the wall was making fun of your penis size but you decide you have more important things to do right now. You see a door to the right of the wall and head down it. It is then that you arrive at your first obstacle.
11432111.title: Anywhere is better than here!

114321112.content:
You look around confused. Expecting a test, all you see is a cart on some sort of mine track. You look around trying to figure out what the test is when you see more writing on the wall.

"A test this is not, I may have Lied"
"For the journey out, is more of a ride"
"Just climb on in, and please sit down"
"You will soon, be back in your town"
"And don't forget. the warning I gave"
"Written on the wall, of the last cave"
"But do not worry, you're leaving in style"
"And you might find, it hard not to smile"

Seeing no other way out of this mess you take a seat in the mine cart. It is a lot smaller than you first anticipated and to comfortably sit you have to place your feet through two holes sticking out of the bottom of the cart. There is also a hole on the seat of your cart, exposing your rear end to the world. A lap bar automatically goes down over your waist, pinning your body to the seat.

You watch your surroundings grow darker and darker as you advance down the track away from the well lit room. You soon find yourself in complete darkness. You can feel the wind rushing past your face as the cart picks up speed. Then something catches your eye. In the distance you see a small light. The light grows and grows as you quickly approach the light. You can clearly see, lining both sides of the track, are a series of torches lighting the way.

You are only feet away from the first torch when you make a horrific realization. Beside each torch stands a large, stiff looking feather. You don't have time to panic as within seconds the first feather brushes past your now trapped foot, forcing a yelp to escape your mouth. Again a feather brushes past your other foot, forcing another scream of surprise from your mouth. The torment continues as your feet are tormented by the seemingly endless line of feathers. You try and bite your lip to hold in the laugh, but you soon start to giggle, and soon after that, full blown laughter occurs.

By the time the trail of feathers stop your abs are aching from the tickling and you can barely make a sound. You continue down the track in complete darkness again, giving you a chance to catch your breath. You hope this will end soon when all of a sudden you again see a glowing light. As you approach it you see the familiar torches that caused you so much pain. But something is different this time. Instead two rows of feathers there is just one going down the middle of the track.

"Few" you think to yourself as you come to the realization that the feathers will be nowhere near your feet. You sit back and relax thinking you are safe when all of a sudden it hits you. Literally. A stiff feather brushes across your bare bottom, causing you to almost jump out of your seat. Unfortunately the lap bar does a good job at keeping you restrained as feather after feather after feather brushes up against your bottom. This tickles so much worse than your feet did and you scream in ticklish agony, knowing there is nothing you can do.

By the time the cart rolls into the station you are a giggling mess. You climb out of the cart and take a seat up against the wall to catch your breath. Fearing what is ahead, you contemplate trying to find another way out of this place. "I can dig a hole! Yell for help! At least find some clothing to protect myself!" but you know it is futile. This place has one purpose. To test the body and mind and you know there only one way out of here. You trudge through the door into the next room.
114321112.title: Rollercoaster

1143211121.content:
You instinctively walk up to the familiar writing on the wall and start to read.

"Hey your back, that was fun"
"Just a couple more, and then you're done"
"This time a puzzle, a brain teaser of sorts"
"To test those, who can play only sports"
"But don't you think, only brains you need"
"For brain and brawn, you will use to succeed"
"Brains you will use, to pass the test"
"But brawn you need, to preform your best"
"Please answer quick, don't count on luck"
"Until you know, you will find yourself stuck"
"So Answer this riddle, and answer right"
"What loses its head in the morning, and gets it back at night?"

As soon as you finish reading the question two holes open in the ground, causing your feet to fall through before getting stuck. You take your mind of off the riddle trying to pull your self out of these holes but your feet are stuck fast. To your horror you then start to feel a feather slowly move back and forth across both of your feet. You try with all your might to pull your feet away from the feather, however it is no use and you start laughing.

You try and think off what on earth the riddle could be talking about as you lay on the ground laughing. The tickling makes it difficult to think, and you have to admit if your abs were a little stronger you might be able to handle the tickling a little better. You think and think and think but nothing comes to mind and you start daydreaming about being back in your home, lying in your bead, with your head against a ............"

"A Pillow" you yell at the top of your lungs. The floor below you gives out and you fall through.
1143211121.title: A puzzle

11432111211.content:
You fall through the hole in the ground and land in what appears to be a underground beach along side a river. The current of the river is very rough and you know that swimming is not an option. You see a raft tied to a tree in the water. You know where this is going, however you walk over to the writing anyways.

"Well this is it, we sure had fun"
"Just on more task, and then you're done"
"A quick ride out, but so you don't drown"
"I would advise, you get tied down"
"And through the rapids, you will go"
"One last thing, I will tell you though"
"When you leave, when you are out"
"Don't be mad, and do not pout"
"Come find me, the writing on the wall"
"And I will lead you, to one large haul"

You walk over to the raft and see that there are four ropes in a noose like position. You put your legs and arms through the holes and as if by magic the get pulled tight. The rope breaks and you start rushing down the river. The don't try and build the anticipation this time. Almost as soon as you started moving, hundreds of feathers hanging from the ceiling start brushing past your body, tickling every inch of you. You scream in ticklish agony as your feat, legs, privates, belly, ribs, sides, neck, ears, nose, armpits, and waist all get tickled by the dangling feathers.

You cant take it anymore and you soon pass out. You are awaken sometime later by a bright light. "Wait that is the sun!" you shout out loud as you realize you are free of that dreadful place. You look around and you are floating by a beach in the woods. You sit up and......
11432111211.title: River Ride

114321112111.content:
You sit up and things finally seem to be going your way. The bonds which kept your strapped down seem to have vanished and you quickly jump off the raft and swim to shore. You walk over to the entrance of the cave and see the familiar writing. You start to read.

"Well that is it, we are all done"
"You did it, You have won"
"Many made it out, but all failed my test"
"They have all failed, none passed my quest"
"For those who gave up, sat there, and cried"
"They are lucky, I did not let them die"
"But you my friend, you persevered"
"All of the tests, you sure did clear"
"So now a reward, you will receive"
"A trinket of sorts, I will leave"
"What does it do, I will not say"
"But also some gold, to you I'll pay"
"Well its been fun, you were a nice guy"
"But here's where we part, and I say my goodbye"
"But before you leave, A thought crossed my mind"
"A thought so funny, Although quite unkind"
"I laugh and laugh, grinning ear to ear"
"You better hope, no one will hear"
"For Its a long walk back, through the cold thin air"
"And it occurs to me, you are still bare"
"So I laugh and laugh because your screwed"
"Have fun walking home, in the nude"


You look down and see a locket of some sorts sitting on the ground and next to it is a bag of gold. You put on the locket and grab the bag. Looking up you see that the writing on the wall has vanished, leaving a blank wall" looking over at the cave you came out of, the current has almost stopped and everything seems quiet. You head off into the woods.
114321112111.title: Head over to the beach

1143211121111.content:
You head back to town with your large bag of gold in one hand, and the nice locket hanging from your neck. You walk quickly hoping you can get back to town before sunrise. If it is dark you should be able to head to the pub and rent a room with very few people seeing you nude. Otherwise the shops will be open and the town square will be packed with people, making it impossible to sneak past them.

You pick up speed as you can see the sun start to make its way over the horizon. With the town in sight, you are running full sprint over the fields just outside of the gate. The guards give you a funny look as you approach the gate but you ignore them and run past them into the town square. You look around and......
1143211121111.title: Head back to town

11432111211111.content:
"Few" you say out loud as you see a completely deserted town square. The entrance of the pub is just across the square and you quickly run to the front door and open it. The pub is also completely deserted besides the bartender, the barmaid, and a passed out man at a table. You approach the bartender. "Looks like someone came into a bit of trouble" the bartender snickers.

"Well let me tell you, it was worth it" you say plopping the large sack of gold onto the bar. The bartender, looking surprised, takes one look at the bag of gold, then starts cracking up. "Man there is some story behind this and I would love to hear it" he says, chuckling to himself.

"Maybe later, for now could I possibly rent a room?" you ask the bartender hoping he will hurry up. You keep catching the barmaid taking quick glances in your direction and she has a large grin on her face. You just want to get upstairs and dressed as soon as possible. "Oh why yes of course. I assume you want to get out of the public eye as soon as possible. A room will be 3 gold pieces for the night. If you would like to extend your stay, come talk to me and maybe I can cut you a break on the price" he says. You hand 3 gold pieces and he hands you a key.

"And maybe once you are a little more presentable, you can come back and tell me this story. I'll even buy the first round" he says to you as you head up the staircase. You pass the barmaid who looks like she just won the lottery. She has the largest grin on her face and she gives you a good looking over as you walk past her. Once you enter the room you can hear laughter coming from downstairs but you don't care anymore and you head into your bedroom and open the closet.

The only thing in the closet is a ragged old pair of shorts that look like they were left here by a peasant. There is no shirt or shoes of any kind here but the shorts are better than nothing and you put them on.

Well now you are barely clothed with a large sack of money and a mysterious locket. What will you do next?
11432111211111.title: It is Empty

114321112111111.content:
You decide it is time to start spending some of your hard earned gold. You decide if you are going to get into this sort of trouble often, you need some better gear. You head to the local blacksmith and take a look around. You see some really nice plate mail in the center of the store. Knowing you don't have enough for this, you head over to the light armor section. You prefer to be quick on your feet anyways, so you look at the leather armor they have. The armor is sleeveless and only covers your chest and belly, but it is much more comfortable so you take it. You also pick up a brand new sword and then head out.

A little ways down the road you come across a nice looking house that appears to be for sale. You talk to the owners and they agree to take you on a tour of the house. The first room you visit is the kitchen and dining area. On the side of the room is a roaring fireplace. Across the rooms is a table and a couple chairs. At the end of the rooms a large staircase leading upstairs. You follow it and it leads to three small bedrooms. Out back is a pair of stocks, and a couple of cats who appear to be hunting mice.

You ask the woman about the stocks and she says that all of the houses have them. They are more for decoration, however they are occasionally used to punish family members. You finish up the tour of the house and you are in love. You hand the woman the rest of your gold and she hands you a key. You are now the proud owner of a new home.
114321112111111.title: Spend some cash

choices: I'll run home and grab something to help
I have to wait for mother to return home
1143211121111111.content:
You have actually never seen a pair of stocks outside of the pillories before, and you definitely have never sat in them before. The temptation is just to much to pass up and so you take a seat and place your feet in the holes. You then place both hands inside of the hand holes. You have to admit this is fairly comfortable. All of a sudden you hear someone behind you.

"Hey mister do you want some help" You spin around to see who said that. Walking towards you is the 19 year old girl you saw sitting on the porch earlier. She has long brown hair, blue eyes. As she walks closer to you you see she is wearing a long green gown. A little embarrassed that you were playing around in the stocks you respond "Oh no I'm OK, I have just never been inside of one of these before and wondered what it felt like" you tell her. "By the way I'm Knight, your new neighbor"

"Nice to meet you, my name is Juliana. And you cant really get the feel of one of those things if the top is not down. Look your hands are barely in the holes. Here let me show you" she tells you as she pulls your hands a little further and closes the top part of the stocks. "There, now you truly know what it feels like to be stuck in one of these things" she says while giggling to herself.

You are now realizing how silly you must look. A grown man, stuck in a pair of stocks with his bare feet and hands trapped. You are kind hunched over and cant seem to move a whole lot. "Well at least I know what it feels like now" you think to yourself. You lift your hands up expecting the stocks to open up. To your dismay the do not.

"Hey can you let me out of here?" you ask the girl
"Sure thing, I just need the key"
"Um... Key?"
"Wait you don't know where the key is?" she says, before laughing her head off.

"No I don't, now can you help me out here?" you ask. The tone in your voice does not hide the fact that you are getting annoyed. You were not planning on spending all day in these stocks, and you don't really want to. She just stands there grinning at you for a moment before speaking again.
1143211121111111.title: Check out the stocks again

choices: Juliana walks back with a feather
11432111211111111.content: "Well since you don't have the key, were going to have to get something to help you out of here" Juliana tells you. She gets up and walks back to her home. You get pretty nervous being left along in the stocks, however you know that she will return soon. Before you know it, someone is walking back. But something is wrong.......
11432111211111111.title: I'll run home and grab something to help

114321112111111111.content:
You see someone walking back, however it is not Julianna. Instead you see her slightly older mother. She walks up to you and introduces herself. "Hello my name is Fiona. I am Julianna's mother. Well technically I am her older sister, however our parents died at a young age so I had to step in as her mother. Now when my sister told me that our new neighbor asked her to lock him in the stocks, I just had to come see myself" she says laughing.

That is not exactly what happened however you decide that it is best not to argue with this woman. You introduce yourself to her. She stands there just grinning at you, almost as of trying to decide what to do with you. "You should really be more careful you know. These stocks are not a game and if the wrong person came along you could really find yourself in a lot of trouble. Now I think we can create a lesson out of this" she says as she......
114321112111111111.title: Her mother is walking back

11432111211111112.content:
"Well unfortunately, my mother is out at the market, and there is nothing I can do to get you out. We are going to have to wait till she gets home and maybe she can help you." she tells you. You can tell by the look on her face that she is enjoying herself. Maybe a little too much. "You cant run and grab help from anyone else" you ask her.

"Nope. I have to watch over the house while mother is away, so I cant leave. You will just have to be patient" she tells you taking a seat on a nearby log. "And she really loves to shop, so that could take a while". The two of you sit there for a minute until Juliana gets up. She looks you over for a minute, gets a grin on her face, and then says "Hey I have a good Idea!". She then......
11432111211111112.title: I have to wait for mother to return home

choices: Tickle a hunk for 10 gold coins
114321112111111121.content:
Walks around to the front of the house, and come back with a wheelbarrow. She then, with a little effort, manages to pick you up and place you in the wheelbarrow, with the stocks sticking over the side. "What on earth are you doing" you ask her thoroughly confused. "Oh you will see" she says. She then, with a great deal of effort, wheels you to the front yard. She then removes you from the wheelbarrow and places you in the front yard.

"What on earth are you doing" you ask with a much sterner tone this time. You have not clue what she is up to, but it does not seem good. She ignores you a second time, then runs inside of your house, and comes back out with a sign. You ask what the sign says and you she turns it around and shows it to you. She than hangs the sign in front of you. The sign said......
114321112111111121.title: Moves you to the front

choices: You see A woman walking her dog
1143211121111111211.content:
"This man was caught stealing from his neighbors. Help us deal out his punishment by tickling him. Only 10 gold coins for 10 minutes of tickling" You yell at her "You are not going to let people tickle me for cash! And I did not steal anything" you protest. She gives you a evil grin, and you start to wonder if she planned all of this when she put you in the stocks. "Yea? What are you going to do to stop me?" she ask you.

"And to make sure that you don't try and convince anyone of your innocence" she ties a handkerchief over your mouth, muffling you. "Great" you think to yourself "There goes your only hope of escape". She then places a cup near your feet and walks up to your porch. taking a seat. It is not long before you see a woman walking down the road. As she passes your house, she sees you.

Interested, she walks up to you to see what is going on. She reads the sign, then starts laughing. She looks up to Juliana, who just waves back to her. The woman places 10 gold coins in the bucket, and then takes a seat on the grass. She then starts dragging her fingernails across your foot, forcing a shriek of laughter to escape your mouth.

Since you are gagged, it came out as "mmmpppphhhhhh" and the woman just looks up at you grinning. "Man you really pissed of the wrong family" she says to you laughing. "I can't imagine being tickled like this. My feet are so ticklish! I would die" you just let out another muffled noise as you try to plead with her to stop. She just laughs and continues her torment of your feet.

She hold back your feet with one hand, and then uses the other one to scribble her nails across the arches of your feet. You shriek out in laughter as you try to break your feet free. It is no use and she continues this torment for a couple of minutes while you try and break free of her grasp. She then gets up, and walks behind you so you cant see her anymore.

You try and turn your head to see what she is doing, but with your hands trapped in the stocks, you cant turn your head far enough. Then all of a sudden you let out a howl of laughter as you feel 5 long fingernails dig into each armpit. You buck with all your might, trying to break free of this torment, but it is no use and you just scream in ticklish agony.

Even with your gagged mouth, your screams are audible to the woman tickling you, and she laughs at your reaction. She continues this torment until your lungs are so sore your laughs are no longer audible. She then stops, thanks you for her time. She is about to leave before she turns around, and picks up the paint bush on the ground, and writes on the sign. "I just wanted to let everyone know about your ticklish armpits. She then leaves, giving you a chance to catch your breath.
1143211121111111211.title: Tickle a hunk for 10 gold coins

11432111211111112112.content:
You have a couple of minutes of rest, and you soon have your breath back. You try and get Julianna's attention, but with your mouth muffled it is hopeless. You sit there in silence for a while until you see a woman walking her dog. The woman appears to be in her late twenties. She stops in front of your house and reads the sign. She then has a very excited grin on her face.

She walks up to you, places a handful of gold in the bucket, and then stares at you with a large grin on her face. "Well I really hope you are not ticklish! Actually no, I really hope you are!" she says laughing to herself "Man if you knew what I had in store for you, you would be terrified" She then Ties her dog to the stocks and.......
11432111211111112112.title: You see A woman walking her dog

1143211121111112.content:
"Whats the point of having all of this wealth if you don't have anyone to spend it with?" you think to yourself. You decide to search the town to tell your friends what you have earned. You grab your new armor and weapons. "Last time you were just hanging out in the town square and look what happened" you think to yourself. You always need to be on your guard. You head out the front door.

114321112111112111.content:
"Hey, don't leave me here!" you protest.
Veronica however does not even bother responding to your complaint, leaving you alone in that small room, that isn't much bigger than the only piece of furniture it contains. The uncomfortable bed you are strapped on to.
You are affraid that she is in such a hurry because she wants to be the very first person to do to your feet, what apparently some people just can't resist doing to trapped bare feet in this town. But with you being in here and your soles being out there, there is no way of knowing.
It however only takes around 30 seconds before you feel fingers touching, no grabbing your big toe. That's got to be her, right? you try to wiggle out of the grip but you soon notice that some kind of noose has been put around your big toe and then around the other one and then, with one strong pull, you feel your big toes being pulled back, now touching the cold wall outside.

Furthermore you notice that there appears to be some kind of arch, or bulge above the wall holes, keeping your soles taut, in a position a foot would assume if it was wearing a boot with perhaps two, or three inch heels.
Soon after that, you feel similar nooses being put around your second and third toes. With your big toes already trapped, there is now way for you to do anything about that happening. As these four new nooses are also pulled back, your feet are almost entirely immobile, with now only your fourth and pinky toes being allowed some wiggle room.
Right after that, as you were expecting your last bit of toe movement to be taken away as well, you instead feel a very rough and violent scratch on both of your soles, right where the ball of the foot meets the arch. Being alone, there is little use in denying your tormenter the satisfaction of your laughter, so you throw back your head and do, as your body commands you to do. You laugh maniacially.

While tears form in your eyes and your head begins to feel light, you vaguely remember Veronica's hands, her fingernails, to be precise. They were very long and sturdy looking, so you conclude that it's got to be her out there.
Your cruel torment continues for several minutes and with every second passing, you hate Veronica more and more. At this point you are no longer able to think of other possibilities, so in your head, Veronica is the culprit. The tickling changes every few seconds, making sure that you develop no tolerance for any of it. After the cruel scratches, you feel slim fingertips exploring the soft and sweaty skin between your toes, after that, you feel spider tickling all over your heels, moving upwards over your arches, only to then have sharp fingernails scratch the sensitive skin under your toes. Every now and then your torturer uses both hands on one foot, lightly scribbling your instep with one hand, while having the other hand wildly tickle your sole.
While still laughing uncontrollably, your hatred for Veronica knows no limits any more and even though you are sure that she cannot hear you out there, you shout at the top of your lungs: "Veronica you filthy $%&§€! Stop it already!!!"

Since this type of crime effected all of the citizens of the town, the citizens have the right to punish the criminal as they deem fit. We do remind the citizens however that since this type of crime did not do any physical harm to the citizens, all punishment must serve the purpose of either embarrassing or annoying the criminal. No physical harm may be done to him"

They then place your feet through the two holes at the end of the chair, and close the stocks, trapping them. Your toes are then tied back, immobilizing your feet. Ladies take him to the holding cell until we can get a straight answer out of him" the captain orders.

The two of you roll on the ground, stopping with you on top. You see one of Emily's daggers in the ground in front of you and you reach for it. As extend your arms the goblin uses the opening to tickle your sides. You grit your teeth and pull the dagger out with only a few giggles. You sit up and stab the goblin through the chest.

You free Emily and she sits up and gives you hug, still trying to catch her breath. You see Knight and Blair are in a similar, but more intimate embrace.

"Are you alright?" you ask Emily as you return her daggers, socks and boots.

"The only thing damaged is my pride." she replies as she blushes and looks down at her bare feet.

"We should look for Arthur, the goblins carried him away. Their tracks should still be fresh and easy to follow" Blair says as she puts on her socks and boots while Knight gathers up her arrows. Blair studies the ground for a moment and says "they went this way." She follows the tracks into the grass and you all hurry behind her.

The grass clears and you see that you've reached the edge of the forest. The trees are impossibly tall and you can't see over them. You head into dense foliage, still following Blair when she suddenly stops.

"Do you hear that? Something is following us!" Blair whispers loudly as you form oa defensive circle, drawing your weapons. You look for your opponent and see..
1212111111.title: Stick together

choices: The Fairy Queen arrives with your magus in tow.
12121111112.content:
Appearing from the nearby trees, the four of you remained on guard as a cloud of bees swarmed out, quickly surrounding your little group. However, it was Blair’s keen eyes that first spotted the truth behind their coordinated movements, remaining poised with a nocked arrow. “Fairies! Everyone, beware of their coordinated attacks!”

“But we just want to play! Ticklemancer says you will play with us! So laugh! We will make you all laugh!” As a cacophony of giggles came from the countless creatures, each fluttering individual about the size of your fist, the cloud quickly broke up to attack each of you, all of them collapsing into bubbly giggles with anticipation as the four of you sprung into action.

Swinging your net in an attempt to swat at some of the irritating things, you quickly regretted your choice of weapons. While they might have been more effective against a larger beast like a hydra or a great boar, the tiny things flew through the holes in your net with ease, dispersing to the multiple thrusts of your trident.

While you managed to catch a few careless fairies as they vanished in a puff of pink smoke, the remainder quickly took notice how easy it was to dodge your desperate attempts. It was just a matter of time until multiple fairies latched onto your legs, slipping underneath your guard with mosquito-like fervor, their wiggling hands almost feeling like ticklish bites on your bare skin. Collapsing to the ground and letting go of your weapons in boyish laughter, you could only writhe about as your hands vainly tried to pry the several fairies from your body one ticklish second at a time. “D-Damn Fairies! Get off of me!”

To your side, Blair and Knight had a much easier time dealing with the swarm. Thanks in part to the Ranger’s earlier warning, Knight had barely enough time to cover her back before the fairies descended. Swinging his sword to cleave an opening, the male could only grunt as his back was pressed against Blair, the latter firing a volley of shots with accurate precision. “We need to find a way out of this! There’s too many of them!”

“Where’s Arthur! He could easily handle these fairies with one-Arggh!” Freezing up with shock at the unfamiliar sensation in his clothes, Knight quickly looked down to see that a dozen moving shapes had already infiltrated the space under his mail armor. As the mischievous things started to begin their ticklish antics, a ticklish grunt could be heard from the corners of Knights mouth as his legs gave way, forcing him to a kneeling position while leaning on his sword for support.

“Knight! Get up! C-Curses! You devious little things! Let go!” Turning her attention to two giggling fairies who were tugging at her bow, Blair dug her heels into the ground as more of their kind joined in the attempt to disarm the archer. However, the stalemate only lasted for a few seconds. Feeling despair as more giggles were heard from behind her, Blair could do nothing but grit her teeth as tiny hands fiddled with the straps of her leather vambraces and chest guard before letting the equipment drop to the forest floor, removing the her last line of defense. As two more daring fairies flew to her underarms to attack with long fluffy reeds they had retrieved from who-knows-where, Blair’s resolve held for a few more precious seconds before the dam that held her laughter gave way, her hands slipping from her hold of her weapon.

With both your fearless leader and archer dropping to the ground with their own hearty and feminine laughter, this only left one member of your ragtag team left. Hearing another hysterical shriek, your hopes were soon dashed. Forcing your head to the side, you could see Emily thrashing on the floor. While the thief had been the most effective in keeping her numerous opponents at bay with her speed and dexterity, her exposed outfit offered her no protection against the tickle dust secreted by their wings, blankets of the purple powder covering every inch of her skin as she tried to furiously scratch away, only managing to tickle herself even more in the process.

After a few minutes which stretched into an eternity for the four of you hysterical heroes…
12121111112.title: a cloud of faries

choices: A hardy and muscular woman from snowy Tuenia, armed with her bare hands.
A fast, silent dusk she-elf armed with a hardwood staff and her long fingernails
125.content:
"I sort of want to do my own thing now, guys", you tell your friends. "But the forest sounds good for later. Maybe I should get warmed up in the arena." "Ok.", says Blair. "Me and Knight will go to the tavern for a bite to eat. See ya!"

You walk through the streets of Avara's Capitol until you reach the Lionstooth Coliseum. An impressive building, it's three stories tall and has seats for thousands. A large sand-floored fighting pit sits in the middle. Grabbing your trident, sling, and helmet, you enter through the gladiators' entrance. Below the seatings sits the preparation room, where fighters are prepared and armed. The man in there lets you keep your trident, sling, and light armor and explains the rules of the Arena to you. It differs from other arenas in that one gladiator must make the other "give up", be it by raw pain and injury, intimidation, or...unorthodox methods.

"Unorthodox methods? like what?", you ask. The trainer tells you that it means someone can do anything if it makes you surrender. You silently hope that no one knows about your extreme ticklishness.

Glad to see you won't be killing anybody, you practice throwing you trident for an hour before the trumpet sounds and you're called out into the ring by an announcer. Squinting because of the sudden light, you see several hundred people filling up a fraction of the seats. "I guess today's turnout wasn't so good", you think to yourself. But your thoughts are suddenly interrupted as from the doors on the other side of the sandpit someone enters.

That person is...
125.title: You go off on your own to the arena

1252.content:
A short, petite woman steps out onto the battle field. Her kind, but focused eyes, fall upon you as she inspects her prey. Her face is very round, and is mostly concealed by her long, jet black hair. You can, however, see two pointed ears poking through her thick mane. Her short, blue dress holds on by spaghetti straps as it blows wildly in the wind. The look of determination is present on her face.

In her left hand she holds a large, wooden staff. Even from this far distance, you can see the ancient carvings that wind around the staff. A large booming voice echoes through the arena.

"Ladies and Gentlemen, the moment you have been waiting for! We have two newbies in the arena today. Our first contestant is a strong and ferocious warrior armed with just his bare hands. Although a little hazy on his past, he is not one to be taken lightly. But he has a through challenge ahead of him as our second contestant a lighting quick wood elf armed with a very ancient looking staff. Now lets here it for them!"

You look around at the crowd as a deafening roar is heard throughout the arena. Next thing you know you are lying on your back, with the she elf standing over you. "gotta pay more attention" she taunts giving, with a grin on her face. you start to get up, but with a strike of her staff, vines shoot out of the sand, wrapping around your body pinning you down. The She elf straddles your waist. She takes her time, letting you squirm.

"Well lets get this over with"
1252.title: A fast, silent dusk she-elf armed with a hardwo...

13.content:
You walk up over the hill and after a long journey you set your eyes on your Destination. Bowerstone, the capital of Avara. Your name is Arthur and you are a powerful Mage. After years of work you became the most powerful Mage in your town, however you grew board. There was no more to learn from your small town so you left and started exploring. You eventually came across Blair, Emily, Throne, and Knight who were all heading to Bowerstone and you decided to join them. You guys became fast friends and have agreed to stick together from now on.

You head past the main gate and enter the town. You pass multiple gates until you enter the center of the city, the market district. You are amazed at what you see. There are rows upon rows of streets full of shops. You see clothing shops, spell shops, armor shops, forges, food shops, and much much more. Over the walls you can just see the top of the Mages college, the biggest college for wizards in the world. You can also see the palace in the in the back of the town.

Everybody goes on their own for now, planning to meet up at nightfall in front of the tavern. You walk down the street trying to decide what to do first. You decide to......
13.title: Arthur

131.content:
Well you did come here to become a better Mage so you head through the city towards the Mages College. You head through the town, passing through some very shady areas, before you reach the edge of town. You stop before a closed gate which leads across the ocean, to the college. The college sits upon a rocky island that is only accessible through this bridge. The location ensures not only security for the Mages in the event of an attack, but also that only college people will venture into the castle.

"You wait by the gate trying to figure out how to gain access. It is a tall gate, way to tall to climb, and it is way to tough to break through. Even if you could, you are sure either of these methods would be seen as hostile to the Mages. After examining the gate closely, you notice and inscription running along one of the metal bars. The inscription reads "To get into the college is your aim, but to get through you must produce a flame, cross the bridge and don't let the flame die, otherwise you must head back and retry"
