This seems simple enough. You cast a flame in your hand and the gate opens. You start slowly walking down the bridge to the college. The flame starts getting smaller and smaller. You have never had to hold a conjured flame this long before and it is really draining your energy. You make it about halfway before the flame goes out. As soon as this happens a gist of wind whirls around you, blocking your vision and lifting you off of your feet. In an instance you are once again standing in front of the gate.

You rest for a couple of minutes before trying again. This time you go through in a full blown sprint and make it across the bridge. Once across you see a young looking girl. She has long white hair and is wearing a black robe and hood. She approaches you.

"Hello, my name is Zyliath and I am the newest member of the college. I have only been here for a day and today I start my first lesson. The elders wanted me to bring you with me and show you the ropes. If you would please follow me we can....
131.title: Go to the Mages College

choices: You wait 30 minutes then go to the defense lesson
sneak into the Arch-mage's room using the window ledge
Practice attack (tickle) magic in the woods. (may get caught or defeated)
1312.content:
Zyliath and you walk up several floors of stone stairs before stopping at a scuffed and unremarkable wooden door. As you are an just an initiate, you guess your room isn't going to be very fancy. She unlocks the door, hands you the key, and shows you the inside. Inside is a desk, a small bed, a clothing wardrobe, and a chest. A single window looks down onto the ocean below. Outside of the window, a thin and precarious ledge runs along the side of the castle.

"Now that you're in your room, I"ll leave so you can unpack whatever you brought. You will be afforded mage robes and shoes. Classes are three times a day. See you, and remember that our first lesson , I think, is in an thirty minutes with Mistress Sarya and the other new people. It's a defense class, in case you get attacked by a tickle hag or a naga.", she says.


After Zyliath leaves, you sit down on your bed and consider your options.
1312.title: Show you your room

13121.content:
You decide you should wait the thirty minutes and attend your class. After all you don't want to get in trouble on our first day. After about 25 minutes, Zyliath returns to your room to lead you to your first lesson. You walk down a series of paths throughout the castle that you could not remember if you tried. You soon arrive at a large looking room, and you take your seat.

"Hello everyone, I believe I see a couple of new people in the class so I will introduce myself. My name is Sarya and I am your defensive magic teacher. In this class you will learn how to use magic to defend yourself, instead of using it to attack. Today we will be learning a simple shielding technique, which is incredibly handy. The spell is called Incantatores Resilit. If preformed correctly, this spell will rebound the spell and fire it back at the attacker. Would anyone like to give it a try?" the teacher in front of the class asks.

"Nobody? How about one of our new student? How about you sir? What is your name?" she asks pointing at you. You nervously tell the audience your name and walk to the front of the class. She shows you how to properly preform the spell and then she tells you to stand at the other side of the classroom. She then tells you to be on guard and when she fires a spell at you, you should try to deflect it.

She then walks to the other side of the room and before you know it she fires a spell at you. You try your best to deflect the spell, but you must have done something wrong as the spell hits you hard. Before you know it, you are laying on the ground. You fell a tingling sensation in your armpits. The sensation gets stronger and you start giggling.

"You see class, I have attacked our student with a simple tickle charm. This charm tickles the student in his most ticklish spot. If he were to properly preform this spell, I would be on the ground laughing instead of him. Unfortunately for him, he mispronounced the spell and did the wrong movements which made his defensive attack pointless. Now instead of me, he is on the ground laughing. I would advice you to work on that spell for the next class" the teacher says as you are rolling on the ground laughing like crazy.

The teacher immediately preforms a spell which stops the tickling and you climb back up, completely embarrassed. You get back in your seat and the class starts preforming their blocking technique. As embarrassed as you were, it seems like nobody could properly do the spell, and multiple people end up on the ground when the teacher tests them.

The class soon ends and Zyliath catches up to you to how you were the next class us. Your next class is.......
13121.title: You wait 30 minutes then go to the defense lesson

131211.content:
Transfiguration. You follow Zyliath, traversing the winding hallways, until you reach your classroom. Seeing as how the two of you basically sprinted to class, you are surprised to see the class is already full of students, and the teacher has already started teaching. "Late how can we be late, We basically sprinted here" you tell Zyliath under your breath.

"Ah I see our two new students got a little lost on the way to class. Don't worry keep at it and you will learn" a mousey looking woman standing in front of the classroom says. The two of you find your seats and she continues teaching. For your first lesson she teaches your class how to turn a feather into a stick. She makes it seem incredibly easy, however when you try it yourself you can barely get the feather to change shape, let alone change into a stick.

Looking around you are relieved to see that everyone else is having just as much trouble as you are. After half an hour of failed attempts the teacher retrieves the feathers and starts lecturing again. "Well we don't expect you to get it on the first day. Just keep at it class and you will be turning humans into desks in no time"

"You can do that" a student in the back shouts out in surprise. "Oh why yes of course. Who wants to see a demonstration?" the teacher asks. She asks for a volunteer however the class remains silent. "How about you sir, yes you the man who was late" You slowly climb out of your seat, not wanting to be part of this.

The teacher assures you that you will not be harmed at all, however you may feel a weird sensation. With a flick of the wrist your body starts changing before your eyes. Your arms and legs start getting skinnier and browner, your joints lock up, your belly starts to get flat. Your head slides off of your neck, and is levitated by the teacher who places your head on her desk.

What once was your body now is a large desk, identical to the rest in the room. "Now you guys wont be expected to do this sort of stuff until the end of the year, but I just wanted to show you that the possibilities are endless" She is about to turn you back when all of a sudden you hear a student yell. Looking up you see a student laying on the ground with their desk broke in half.

"Um teacher I think my desk is broken" the student says completely embarrassed. Se climbs up off the ground and the teacher levitates the broken parts into the corner of the room. "Ah no worries we will get this fixed in no time. But until then, I am sure that Arthur will be willing to lend a "Body" " the teacher chuckles, laughing at her own joke.

Before you have time to speak the teacher places your body, now a desk, in front of the student. and moves your head onto a desk in the front row. "There now Arthur you can see and Jenny has a desk. Everyone is happy. Ok good now on with the lecture"

The teacher continues her lecture until.....
131211.title: Transfiguration

choices: The teacher knew the entire time
1312111.content:
"Hey!" you gasp as what feels like a fingernail drags across your stomach. The teacher, with a stern look on her face, looks at you briefly before continuing her lecture. Although you mange to gain your composure, the tickling sensation has not subsided. Up above, Jenny is subconsciously dragging her fingernails against her desk.

You must not be as stealthy as you though as Zyliath leans in close to you and whispers "What is wrong with you, you look like you are about to explode" You tell her everything is fine but she obviously does not believe you. She looks back and sees Jenny scratching her fingernails against the desk. She looks back at you and quickly puts the pieces together.

"Whats the matter a bit ticklish" she taunts in a hushed voice. You ignore her and try to focus on the lecture. Zyliath on the other hand , is having fun watching your torment. Deciding that you are not in enough torture, she writes a note that reads "He can still feel everything. Have Fun! ;)" and passes it back to Jenny. Jenny, after reading the note, gives Zyliath a thumbs up.

You thought the tickling was bad before but this next feeling is unbearable. Jenny, up above, has started moving the feather end of her quill against the leg of her desk. The feeling of her soft quill brushing against your underarms is too much and you start giggling. The teacher glares at you again and Jenny quickly stops the tickling.

The teacher ignores you again and starts teaching. As soon as the lecture continues, Jenny starts feathering your armpits again, and another snort escapes you. The teacher stops her lecture again and stares at you. "One more outburst and you will get detention" the teacher coldly whispers in your direction. She starts teaching again. Like clock work Jenny starts the tickling as soon as the teacher turns back to the class. You try with all your might to withstand the torment but it is not use and you snort again.
1312111.title: Jenny starts tickling you

13121111.content:
"That's it detention!" the teacher yells as you start laughing again.
"But I can....."
"Hush!" the teacher yells, clearly angry at your lack of respect.

You try and explain your self but as soon as you open your mouth Jenny starts tickling you again and you slam your mouth shut to prevent you from laughing. The teacher goes on teaching and although Jenny continues to tickle you through the class, she goes easy on you and you mange to keep quiet for the rest of class.

As the class ends, the students all run out of the classroom, ready to enjoy the break they have in their schedule. Unfortunately you are not one of those students. The teacher places you back together and tells you to follow her. You think about telling her what happened but seeing her angry frightens you and you decide it is better to just take your punishment.

She leads you through a door in the back of the room.
13121111.title: You get Detention

choices: Take care of the serpette (a mythical creature)
131211111.content:
The door leads into the teachers office. Hanging on the wall, directly across from the door, is a picture of the Arch-mage. The picture hangs crooked, as if a blind person hung it up. Many more picture of famous mages cover the walls in a similar manner. Directly under the photo of the Arch-Mage sits a messy desk covered in books and pages.

The teacher leads you into her office and takes a seat behind the desk. You stand there awkwardly, as the teacher sorts through some of the papers on her desk, making a clearing. She then takes out a piece of paper and a quill and starts jotting some notes down. Making a quick glance at the paper, you see a list of names, the last belonging to you.

You contemplate explaining your situation to her, but the silence is frighting and you decide to remain quiet. It seems like an eternity until she finally sets down her quill and looks up at you, wearing a displeased look on her face. "I do not like being mocked in my class" The coldness in her voice sends chills down your spine.

"But I can explain" You speak softly, the fear apparent in your voice. "I don't want to hear it" She loudly responds and you decide you should just keep your mouth shut. She sits there silently for a couple moments, clearly thinking to herself. You start to get nervous, not knowing what she is planning on doing to you. "Clearly they cant kick you out for laughing in class" the idea crosses your mind. Although you are certain they wont, you cant get the idea out of your head.

"Alright Mr. Arthur, since you think it is so funny to laugh at inappropriate times, your are just going to really enjoy your punishment. You get to........"
131211111.title: Her Office

choices: The vines start exploring your vulnerable areas
1312111111.content:
"You get to wash and feed the Serpette" she says with a almost sadistic grin on her face. She quickly stands up, and leads you out of her office. As you follow her through the brick hallways, you see Jenny leaving a classroom. She smiles at you as you pass and whispers "have fun" quiet enough so the teacher cant hear her. You give her a cold look and follow the teacher out of the castle.

She leads you out to the fields just outside of the castle grounds. It does not take long before the teacher finds your target and points it out to you. "This here is Krilla, the Serpetta you will be feeding and and cleaning. I mist warn you.... "

You start thinking about how completely unfair this is. You get turned into a desk, get tickled during class, and somehow this is your fault. Its outrages that you are getting a detention for....

"Did you get that" she asks coldly. You quickly snap out of your trance and look up at her. "Oh yea I got it" you lie.

"Crap what did she say?" You kick yourself in the back for zoning out like that. She wishes you good luck and sends you on her way. You pick up the brush and walk over to the beast you are supposed to be brushing. The creature looks like a large horse, standing almost ten feet in the air. It has large white wings sprouting out of its back. Silver vines sprout out underneath the wings, which it uses to grab food off the ground.

You approach the creature and start using the brush to clean its coat. You move down and start brushing its belly when all of a sudden you feel something wrap around your ankle. Before you know what happened you are swept off your feet and you something else wraps around your remaining foot and arms.

The creature has used its vines to grab all of your appendages and now holds you above its body, spread out in the air. You struggle trying to get free however its hold on your arms are tight and you are not going anywhere.
1312111111.title: Take care of the serpette (a mythical creature)

13121111111.content:
"How do I get myself into these situations" you think to yourself as the creature starts slowly flapping its wings. The creature uses one of its vines to rip off your robe, exposing your upper body as the wings brush up against your exposed belly. You bite your lip trying to hold in your laughter, but the creature does not seems to care.

The creature continues to eat food off the ground and does not even seem to notice the fact that up above you are fighting with all your might trying to get away. Your start to run out of energy, and a small chuckle escapes your mouth, followed by another and another and another. It is not long before the creature forces a steady stream of laughter escaping your mouth as she uses her wings to torment your belly and sides.

You start to think that you are going to be trapped here, entertaining this terrible creature for a long time, as you run out of energy and stop fighting. An array of unanswered girlish screams and pleas for help pour out of your mouth as the creature starts using one of its vines to poke around your exposed underarm. This new sensation causes you to laugh even louder.

Another vine wiggles into your other armpit and two more start gliding across your exposed feet making sounds come out of your mouth that you did not even know you were capable of. Your abs start getting tired from laughing so long and the only bright side you can think of is that no one is around to see you scream like a little girl.

Of course your luck is not that good as you hear a female chuckle from below. "Looks like somebody was not paying attention in magical creatures class" You turn your head to see....
13121111111.title: She starts flapping her wings

1312112.content:
The teacher has only been teaching for a couple of minutes when a student runs into the room. "The south wing is on fire! We need your help putting it out" the student yells. The teacher, ignoring the class completely, runs out of the room leaving the class alone. "So I guess the class is over" a student jokes. The class start packing up there things and one by one the students leave the classroom.

"Wait what about me!" you yell to the students. Some ignore you, some tell you they would help if the could, others think your situation is hilarious and tease you about it, but no one seems to want to help you. You start to worry that you are going to be stuck here until the teacher gets back when you see as student walk up to you from the back of the room.

You recognize this girl as Jenny, the girl who broke her desk. She wears a large smirk on her face and looks at you with a playful look in her eyes. "So someone seems to be in a bit of a pickle here" she says with a tone of mischief. You star to get a little nervous at the way she is looking at you. The class is completely empty now and the two of you are alone.

You think you can help me out" you hopefully ask. Her grin gets wider. "I don't think so"
1312112.title: There is an emergency

13121121.content:
Jenny lifts you up, and carries you to a shelf behind the teachers desk. From this vantage point the entire class can see you, but if a teacher were teaching they would not notice you. "Oh and one more thing" she takes out her wand and casts a spell on you. You go to ask her what she has done, but no sound comes out of your mouth. "Have fun" She says as she turns around and walks toward the door. But before she leaves, she takes out her wand, and taps the desk, leaving a message that says "Give me a quick tickle, and you will be in for a treat"

She then turns around and leaves the room.
13121121.title: She makes your situation worse

choices: She put a spell on you
13121122.content: She walks up to the desk, mumbles some words, and you see the desk change back to your body. She knees down and does something else to it before getting up and walking back to you. She grabs your head and reattaches it to your head. "Um thanks" you tell her, surprised by her generosity. She looks at you still grinning. "Oh I would not thank me yet" she says.
13121122.title: She helps you... Sorta

choices: You successfully cast your defense ward and knock her back, and prepare.
She brushes aside your failed spell and strikes.
131212.content:
Embarrassed by your failure from the previous class, you mutter to her that your next class is the Creatures class. As she walks with you, you wave your hands a little and try to remember the defense ward incantation's pronunciation. The Magical and Dangerous Creatures classroom is located in a tower on the north side of the massive stone building. You, Zyliath, and a dozen other students climb the steps and enter the tower.

The master mage of this class is named Ardef. Although he is old, his voice is powerful enough to capture the attention of the class. "Today ,for our first class we are going to work on using simple defense wards against magical creatures." You mentally groan as you remember your experience last class with defense spells. Ardef continues, "Rest assured that we teachers will intervene before any real harm can be done."

Ardef waves his hands in the air, mutters a long incantation, and a blue, magical cage is teleported into the large center of the room. In it sits a captured naga, a woman with the lower body of a snake, who hisses and says a few strange words in her strange tongue. Around the cage Ardef conjures a large circle of energy, to ensure that once released the naga couldn't reach the new students. Suddenly Ardef looks you in the eye and says, "You there, come and show me those defense wards you practiced. He lets you through the energy circle to the naga's cage. Shivering, you look into the eyes of the snake-woman. They show only one desire- to tickle you until you pass out, or worse. But Ardef is there to make sure that doesn't happen, right?

Suddenly the naga' cage dissapears, and she hisses and slithers forward. From the corner of your eye you can see Zyliath cheering you on. The naga charges at you, her objective to use her tail to tie you up and her fingers to tickle you into submission. You prepare to cast the defense ward.
131212.title: Magical Creatures

choices: Ardef sends her back to her cage with a burst of tickle energy
She vaults the magical barrier and wreaks havoc on the class.
1312122.content:
Seeing the strange snake woman deftly slither towards you freaks you out and you mix up your physical block ward with your spell deflection spell. Panicking, you reach for the staff strapped to your back. It's too late and her tail sweeps your legs out from under you. Before you hit the ground she catches you with her four arms. Her tail ties you up from the waist down and she pulls you back, totally immobilizing you. One of her hands pins your arms together and pulls them above your head. You burst out into loud laughter when two long nailed fingers dig into your armpits. Her last hand squeezes and kneads your sides while the tip of her tail strokes your feet and thighs.

After just 10 seconds you are in tears. Your face turns a bit redder when you see Zyliath and the rest of the class watching you, looking scared. The naga brings her human-like face up to you and taunts you in her language.
Then...
1312122.title: She brushes aside your failed spell and strikes.

13122.content:
You decide to sneak into the Arch-Mage's chamber. You open the window and slowly climb out onto the ledge. The ledge is much smaller than you anticipated, and with the strong winds blowing you wonder if this was such a good idea. You slowly nudge your way along the ledge, making sure to keep your balance, and it is not long before you reach the window of the Arch-Mage's room.

The window opens with ease and you slowly climb in. Your feet land on the cold, stone floor and it is just now that you realize you forgot your shoes in your room. You are in a large, circular room filled primarily with books, ingredients, and a large boiling pot in the middle of the room. You see a staircase to your left that leads to a second story.
13122.title: sneak into the Arch-mage's room using the w...

choices: You will be placed in the castle stocks
I will be teaching you a lesson
131221.content:
You were just thinking this was a little too easy when you hear a low, soft-spoken voice come from behind you. "Well what do we have here?" You freeze like a deer in headlights. You are afraid to turn around and face your captor, however just by the tone in the voice you can tell it comes from a female. Expecting them to be angry, their friendly, inviting tone is a little unsettling.

"Well are you just going to stand there all day or are you going to introduce yourself to your Arch-Mage?" It takes a second for you to fully comprehend what she said, and as you do, your heart skips a beat. "Th-th-th The Arch-Mage?" you respond in a weak, cowardly voice. You slowly turn around and sitting in a chair in the corner of the room is the Arch-Mage

The arch-mage wears a very oval shaped face with an almost non-existent chin. She she has a pair of deep, sky blue, eyes that could make just about anyone melt. She wears a long blue robe that matches her eyes perfectly and a hood thst covers most of her head. Her long, white hair flows out of the sides of her hood and all the way down past her shoulders. She wears and mischievous grin on her face.

"I-I-I" you stammer trying to figure out what to say. The way she is just sitting there and grinning at you makes you feel like a trapped animal. Eventually you find your voice. Not being able to think of any way out of this you lower your head and speak. "I.... I have nothing to say. I broke in and I am sorry. I will grab my things and leave" You slowly make your way to the door.

"Stop" she says. You stop dead in your tracks and turn towards her. "The ledge you climbed out on is dangerous and you were the first student I have ever seen who was stupid enough to risk climbing out onto it. You are lucky you survived. And you did all of this for the sole reason that you wanted to break into my private chambers. You have risked everything....... To gain the knowledge that lies between these shelves. And after all that is why we are all here, to gain knowledge, is it not?"

You look up at her confused. "So I am not going to be kicked out?" you asked her in a hopeful tone. She looks you over for a minute and then responds. "I must stress how serous of an offense this is. Although your reasons were admiral, your actions were not. You will not be kicked out, but you will be punished"

Your heart skips a beat when you hear this. You are not getting kicked out! You broke into the Arch-Mages bedroom and all you are getting is a slap on the wrist. You don't even care what the punishment is you are just happy you get to stay! "Thank you so much! I promise it will never happen again!"

"Good, now for your punishment....."
131221.title: You hear a voice

1312211.content:
"Now, for you punishment I will need you to follow me" she tells you. Her voice is much more demanding than before and you know you better do what she tells you. You follow her through a large wooden door that leads you out of her bedroom into the hallway. She leads you down to the end of the hallway and stops next to a large Mirror. She taps the mirror with her hand and steps into it. She easily passes through the mirror and you follow her through.

You are surprised when you find yourself in a small tunnel, barely large enough for you to walk through. You can feel the cold, damp dirt on your bare feet and look around for the Arch-Mage. You turn around behind you and are stunned when you come face to face with a rock wall. The way back is blocked. With the Arch-Mage gone and the way back blocked your only hope is to continue on to the end of the tunnel where you see a small, bright light shinning through.

A sudden burst of cold water hits the top of your head as you pass through the edge of the tunnel. You take a look back and see that you have just stepped out of a waterfall. The waterfall originates from a large gargoyle statue on top of a rock and empties out into a stream. You look around and see that you are standing in the center of a large courtyard.

The yard is incredibly large, spanning almost a mile in every direction. On each end of the yard there lies a stone wall that spans the entire length of the courtyard. A thick layer of trees cover the four walls creating the illusion that you are standing in the middle of a forest. The place is full of students walking through the forest. Every once in a while a student will appear out of seemingly random places like a tree or a stone. And just as easily as they appeared they will disappear in the same manner. Multiple students are standing in clearings practicing spells and others are just laying out enjoying the sunlight.

You see the Arch-Mage standing by a tree and she orders you to follow her. She leads you through the trees and you come to a large pond. She kneels by the pond and places the palm of her hand on the ground. As she does this the ground at the bottom of the pond rises creating a dirt bridge that leads to a small island in the middle of the pond. You follow her across the bridge. In the center of the island sits a pair of stocks.

"Now sit" she orders you in the same demanding tone from before. You do as she says, not wanting to see her when she is angry. She waves her hands and the stocks seem to come to life. The stocks enclose around your ankles, trapping them. Some rope attached to the back of the chair comes to life and wraps itself around your hands like snakes, trapping them so that your elbows make right angles just at shoulder length and your wrists are trapped above your head.

With a clap of her hands a blue fiery ring pops out of the ground and surrounds you. "For your punishment you will be trapped in these stocks a couple of hours. This ring will stop anybody from reaching you" she tells you, sounding a little nicer now. "OK, well since nobody can reach me, all I have to do is sit here. This sounds pretty easy" you tell her relieved. I mean this is the easiest punishment ever.

"I would not say that. The student here are quite clever" she tells you with a smile on her face "The ring just makes them work for it." She gives another clap and you are covered in a big puff of smoke. When the smoke clears you look down at yourself and see that you are now sitting in just your underwear. She claps her hands again and vanishes, leaving the bridge to the island in place. You have to say, although you are supposed to be in punishment, this area is quite peaceful. The gently waves crashing into the island calm you and there is a lot of wild life crawling around to keep you company. Everything seems fine.
1312211.title: You will be placed in the castle stocks

13122111.content:
You are starting to think this is going to be the easiest punishment of your life when you see someone crossing the bridge to the island. As the individual approaches you see the familiar long white hair and black robe and see that it belongs to Zyliath. She walks up to the edge of the fiery circle with a confused look on her face.

"Arthur? Is that you? What on earth happened? I came back to get you for class and you were not there!" You can tell by the tone in Zyliath's voice that she was really worried about you. You tell her about how you sneaked into the Arch-Mages room and how you got caught. You then tell her about the insane journey that brought you to these stocks.

"And.... She took all of your clothing?" She asks confused. "Yea I'm not really sure why she did that. Supposedly this is supposed to be some terrible punishment. But all I have done so far is sit here. She said that no one could cross the line but that some students can get quite clever. I'm not really sure what she meant by that" you tell her.

Zyliath studies the blue flame closely. She tries to move her hand past it however her hand stops dead in it tracks as it hits an invisible barrier. "Hmm I wonder" She then grabs a bird feather off the ground and tosses it towards the flame. Unlike her hand, the feather passes the invisible barrier with ease. "Oh I get it" she says talking to herself.

"What is it" you ask her confused. Zyliath stares at you like a piece of meat and you start to get nervous. "Well if you were in class today you would know that we learned how to levitate objects. And I'm thinking its time for a practice test" she says wearing a slight grin on her face. She waves her hands and like magic the feather starts floating in the air.

She practices her control a little bit as she does circles around you with the feather. "Wow that is really neat!" you tell her. "Yea, and super useful to" she tells you. You are about to ask her what she means when the feather takes a dive down towards you. She stops it as it rests under your armpit, then with a flick of her wrist the feather starts moving back and forth, brushing against your underarm.

You immediately bite your lip to try and hide the laughter that is trying to escape your body. "Hey stop that!" She gets a more serious look on her face. "Well maybe if you would have shown up to class instead of breaking into off limit areas you would not be in this situation" she tells you sternly. "You could have been injured, you could have been expelled, you could have even been killed! You got lucky and I think I need to teach you a lesson!" she says seriously.

She grabs another feather off the ground and guides it to your other armpit, and like the other, it starts tickling you. Once in place the feathers seem to be moving under their own power as she no longer needs to guide them. She just sits back and admires her work as you try with all your might to prevent laughter from escaping your mouth.

"Come on it will be much easier if you just let it out" she tells you. She seems to be enjoying your ticklish torment greatly as she wears a large grin on her face. The two feathers start wearing down and a giggle soon escapes your mouth, followed by another and another. It is not long before a steady stream of laughter is escaping your mouth.

"See was that so hard" she mockingly says........
13122111.title: A novice witch walks up

131221111.content:
Zyliath nearly jumps of her skin as she hears a voice come from behind her. She was to busy enjoying the show to see the individual cross the bridge and walk up behind her. She spins around coming face to face with a brown haired woman wearing a green cloak.

The woman is much taller than Zyliath and you can tell by the maturity in her voice that she is slightly older. "Wow just yout first day and you already have got the hang of the stocks" the woman laughs. Zyliath, slight embarrassed, starts to blush and stammers out a response. "Ugh yea, I was just.....". Zyliath gets cut off short as the woman starts laughing.

"Haha oh you don't have to explain yourself to me. I make sure I never miss a student in the stocks. Its loads of entertainment. My name is Katie by the way" the woman introduces herself as a third year student and chats with Zyliath while the feathers are still driving you insane. Katie, with a wave of her hands, stops the feathers, which drop to the ground.

"Anyways you wanna learn a couple new spells to use to really teach this kid a lesson" Katie says. Zyliath quickly agrees and Katie whispers something in her ear. Zyliath gets a large grin on her face and eagerly says "Lets do it" Katie whispers something else in her ear and then Zyliath walks up to you and repeats the spell that Katie gave her.
131221111.title: Someone Approaches

choices: You dive at the ghost foolishly
Katie casts a spell at it
1312211112.content:
"Erm... Spectram incantatam priorius!" Zyliath shouts while waving her hands in a crescent motion. Katie nods approvingly as a blue aura forms in front of Zyliath's hands and grows bigger by the second. The misty light shapes around menacingly in her hands for a few more moments and shifts into the shape of a pale, icy woman: a spectre.

The air around you and the two women grows slightly chillier as the ghost drifts towards your bound form, misty talons outstretched. Wriggling to get free, you can do nothing else as her cold slimy fingers slowly drag up and down your bare armpits. "Hee hee, eheheh, ahahahahah!" You begin giggling softly and attempt to get away by pulling and pulling more, but you are reduced to helpless giggly laughter as Zyliath and Katie stand and watch in awe. Then the spirit decides to go full force.

Mild laughter turns to full-force guffaws, almost yelling as the sperctre digs her pointy fingers into both armpits. You can do nothing but scream and laugh when she squeezes and pinches the hollows of your armpits for what seems like eternity. Then she switches tactics.
Her hands slyly slink down and hover over your legs agonizingly for a minute before they start pinching and kneading the soft flesh of your inner thighs. Your face turns beet red as you belt out laughter full force from this embarrassing tickling. " AHAHAHAHAHA!" This is when Zyliath and Katie become a bit nervous, as you are panting between your shrieks of laughter.

Suddenly Zyliath turns and shouts the spell again, "Spectram incantatam priorius!" The spell has no effect! Zyliath runs over to you and pries open the stocks. The spirit is too late to stop her as you collapse to the ground but in revenge floats over to Zyliath and squeezes her wide hips over and over again. She shrieks and tries to retreat, but can do nothing as the specter somehow holds her in place to run her ghostly fingers up and down Zyliath's ribs. You begin to get up and are slowly recovering from the torture.
1312211112.title: A ghost appears

13122111121.content:
Without missing a beat you make an all out dash towards the spirit, diving on its back when you reach it. Naturally, you fly right through it and land hard on the ground. You turn your head and see the spirit no longer is attacking Zyliath and now is floating your way. You scramble to your feat and make a dash for the bridge.

With the ghost hot on your tail you make your way over the bridge and into the woods. You turn your head to see Zyliath and Katie running after you, however they are clearly not as fast as you and are having a tough time keeping up. As you run deeper into the woods you lose sight of the two of them completely. The ghost however remains only feet behind you.

As you feel the ghosts hand graze across your back you start to think you are doomed. You try and pick up the pace but the ghost is running you down and you don't know how much longer you can last. Just as you think all is lost you see the wall marking the edge of the courtyard. You are about to give up and let the ghost catch you when something catches your eyes.

At the base of the wall is a small hole, just a couple feet wide, just large enough for you to slip through. The hole is quite dark and appears to go deep underground. Diving in a hole does not seem like the smartest idea, however the only thing on your mind is to escape your pursuer, and you dive down. As you slide down the hole, you look back to see the ghost standing at the base of the hole.

Something is wrong. As you stare up towards the ghost your vision starts to get blurry. You hear someone yell "Superare Specter" from the top and see the ghost vanish. As you go deeper down the hole your vision gets blurrier. You can still see the rays of the sun poking through the entrance of the hole when you pass out.
13122111121.title: You dive at the ghost foolishly

131221111211.content:
You slowly begin to wake up. As you move every limb in your body, wanting to make sure you did not break anything during the fall, you come across a problem. Although you can move your neck and your ankles fine, the rest of your body seems to be completely immoral. Almost like it is not there at all. As your vision starts to come back you look around.

The image you see is frighting. Your head seems to be resting on some sort of plaque mounted on the wall. You look down and see a pair of feet sticking out of the wall. You quickly move your ankles and confirm that those are in fact your feet. There rest of your body is nowhere to be seen. You seem to be in some sort of hallway, however it is much more deserted than the hallways you came in.

Well you have two options, you can either yell for help, or try and get out yourself.
131221111211.title: The Statue

1312211112112.content:
"I wonder if I can get it to work without my hand motions" you think to yourself as you try and remember a spell you once used to walk through walls. It was not a hard spell to use, but without your hands it may prove difficult. "Oh well its worth a shot" You think to yourself as you shout the incantation. "The help of the ghost, please represent" you yell, as an ominous thunder roars in the background.

"Why hello there little fella, are you going to help me out of here" you chuckle as you stare eye to eye with a goat. Like you said earlier, doing magic with out your hands is hard. Honestly you are lucky things did not end up worse. You have to admit thought, there is something odd about this goat. As he slowly walks towards you, it looks almost as if he wears a slight smirk on his face.

"The help of the ghost, please represent...... The help of the goat, please torment.... oh no.... HEY!" you gasp, barely having time to comprehend what happened as you feel a long, wet tongue glide across the sole of your foot. You wiggle your foot with all your might but the goat keeps up with ease as he darts his tongue in and out of your toes and around the heel of your foot.

The goat, wearing a look of satisfaction on its face, seems to be pleased at the steady stream of giggles escaping your mouth. You try with all your might to pull your ankles away from its taunting tongue but alas the wall holds steady and you have nowhere to go. The goat finds your sweet spot as it starts nibbling on the heel of your foot. You cant take it anymore and you scream out in laughter. "NO HAHAHAHA NOT THEHEHHEHEHEHER!!!!"
1312211112112.title: You attempt a spell

choices: Cast a breathing charm and dive into the pool
131221111212.content:
"Ugh... my head..." You crack your eyes open slightly, and find yourself lying on your back on a large, flat rock floor. The room is perhaps the size of a large auditorium, but whether it is natural or man-made you cannot tell. The ceiling is many feet above you, and withing that ceiling you can spot the hole through which you fell. There is quite a tunnel above that and only a few pinpricks of light shine from it.

You stand up and gather your wits. The pain in your head has vanished, but you're still a bit wobbly on your feet. "Damn it!", you think to yourself, "There's no way I can climb that high, and I haven't learned any levitation spells yet." Resigned to your fate, you pace around the cave and take in your surroundings. In one corner there is a pool of murky black water. It churns and bubbles silently but may lead somewhere if you cast an easy underwater breathing spell. In the opposite side of the cave there is a large square doorway, twice your height, ringed with the mysterious symbols of a forgotten cult. To the sides of the door are two torches, magically lit, whose illumination provides most of the light in the cave

You'd better hurry up and make a choice; from a crack in the wall the moaning of raised dead sounds. The cave must have been near an ancient crypt! The zombies who have been raised know no friend or foe, only willing to do the bidding of he or she who raised them. And they don't sound happy! Already one has forced her way through the crack, outstreching her bony fingers towards you.
131221111212.title: You Awaken

choices: Surrender to Mythresse and laugh your head off for the foreseeable future
Accept the Arch-Mage's proposal and spare your aching ribs
1312212.content:
"Well...I won't be"...she chuckles..."but I have a..helper,shall we say...that will...."...She extends her hand and makes a slow beckoning motion with a
very long , perfect fingernail. "Mythresse, if you please"..she cooes with a playful grin. Instantly a 7 foot tall,exquiste female form materializes inside the room
out of nowhere. Smooth and featureless,it turns its head as if regarding you. The Arch-Mage laughs musically...."Yes, my dear..that's him...."

You stare in fascination as a stunning transformation occurs. The featureless form ripples and changes.....long platinum hair spills halfway down her back in
gentle waves... piercing green eyes,button nose and full lips with a slightly amused smile define a classically beautiful face. Tanned, almost glowing skin
highlights her voluptuous body,accentuating every curve. Her hands flex,revealing dagger-length nails..gently rounded at the tips. Her eyes lock on to yours and she smiles. "Hello,there"...she speaks in a low,throaty tone,raising a hand to wiggle those nails at you.

The Arch-Mage claps her hands in delight, her own nails clicking together as she does. "Marvelous! "..she exclaims.turning to regard you..."Surely you have
noticed that Mythresse's appearance is drawn from your deepest fantasies...and LOOK...she even has my fingernails...how VERRY interesting...." Grinning
knowingly at you..."Maybe someday....,but for NOW,my little snoop...you belong to her". You finally snap out of your trance and ask "Belong to her?..What is she,anyway? I've never seen anything like that type of magic"'.

"And you won't anywhere else, this is magic of my own design"..she states with pride. "As to what Mythresse IS..well suffice it to say that she is a magical entity that I can contact and dismiss at my will. There are no exact terms to describe her..but the closest the students here have come is to call her...*she
smiles wickedly*...a TICKLE elemental"..... Your blood freezes as Mythresse's talons begin to wiggle,a cruel smirk playing on her gorgeous face.....

"Oh, no...nooo"..you sob as you rush for the door. The Arch-Mage chortles and languidly casts a spell,causing a fold of carpet to rise under your feet,tripping
you. You stumble and fall to the floor and immediately Mythresse is upon you, sliding sinuous arms under yours and then lacing her fingers behind your head.
She lifts you off the floor effortlessly in a tight, unbreakable full-nelson..giggling at your futile struggles. As you kick your legs, trying to break free, the Arch-Mage casts another spell..magical bonds pull your ankles back and restrain them around Mythresse's long legs...

Both ladies laugh mockingly at your pleas for mercy...the Arch-Mage finally purrs.."Bring him here to me,my dear"... as she lounges in a plush chair, a glass
of wine in her manicured hand. "With pleasure,Mistress"..Mythresse replies with barely concealed glee. You are brought close to the Arch-Mage...sweat
breaking out over your body as you realize you are within easy tickle-range of those fantastic fingernails. She studies you bemusedly.....then extends her
shapely hand...nails making a slow tickling motion... You begin to babble..."No,please...don't tickle me....I'm sorry...nooo...I'll do anything..." Mythresse snickers and tightens her grip, whispering.."Got you where we want youuu,ticklish.......youre in trouble..hehe"

The Arch-Mage pauses,her talons flexing a scant inch from my defenseless belly..."So,you think you're WORTHY of feeling my nails torture you senseless,do you?...Hmm....you are NOT". Her hand retreats and curls around her wineglass,nails tapping musically against it. You sigh and relax slightly in
Mythresse's iron grip,relief evident on your sweaty face. "However," she continues,a mischievous smile playing on her lips..."I do like to watch". Horror and
realization dawns on you as Mythresse raises two extra hands,fingernails wiggling..in front of your eyes..... "I'll only use TWO extra on you for your first offense,
ticklish"..she gloats.."you wont survive otherwise" She smiles at the Arch-Mage...."Mistress?"

The Arch-Mage rests her hand on her chin as she watches my frantic stuggles with delight....then raises a talon and waves it....."Tickle him for me,dear....
make him suffer..." You scream "No-"...then laugh hysterically as Mythresse's free hands do their devilish work..rippling those wicked nails into my armpits
and down my sides without pattern or pause.... "Itchy kitchy kitchy koooo....laugh for Mistress"..she whispered...."I'm hoping you NEVER
learn to behave here, you know that?" Her fingers increased speed...driving me even further insane.

You could barely form words or thoughts.."AHAHAHAHA, please..stahahap......no more....nooooohehehehe..NGGGGGGHHHHHH" ...your pleas choked off
by Mythresse's long talon wiggling in your navel. The Arch-Mage beamed, her eyes aglow with pleasure...."Tickle tickle tickle..you're SO much
fun to torture..I'm considering giving you to Mythresse permanently..how would you like THAT?" The giggling in your ear told you what Mythresse thought of that idea.....YOUR mind had a harder time grasping it..... She continued..."But I have a proposition for you..if you can hear it"....she snickered..."Mythresse, dear...slow down for a bit..just a bit"

The torturing fingernails eased up...enough to hear the Arch-Mage speak over you own frenzied laughter. "Now then,I need someone to retrieve something I
..um..misplaced..a while ago....." she clicked her nails together in annoyance..."will you agree?" You wheeze and gasp...."what..what is it?" She waved a hand,
the nails passing deliberately close to my vulnerable belly...and I flinched, giggling harder. "No details until you accept....decide"..she declared. "Oh, I forgot..
Mythresse, dear..he's heard the offer...pick up where you left off".

A sadistic chuckle echoed in my ear as the tickling nails returned to maximum speed...."Goochy goochy goooo.....come on,honey..I know
you love this, surrender to meeee"..Mythresse ran her tongue into your ear as you howled with renewed laughter.....


Well, what's it to be?
1312212.title: I will be teaching you a lesson

131222.content:
"Well I mise well go explore a little bit" you think to yourself as you start walking around the room. You walk up to one of the bookshelves and see some odd looking books like "Advanced tickle traps Volume 3" and "Magic Pranks Volume 12". You leave the shelf and continue walking along the room. You see a lot of weird looking things in jars that you have never seen in your life.

You make a full loop around the room, landing you back in front of the bookshelf. You decide to......
131222.title: You explore

1312221.content: You grab the first book you come to which is labeled "Magic Pranks Volume 12" and open it up. You read through some spells, however you are unable to read them because they are in a foreign language. Leafing through, you pick a random spell. Next to the spell is a moving picture of someone preforming the spell. You mimic the person and read the spell. A burst of light shoots out of your hands.......
1312221.title: Read a book

13122212.content: Looking around, it does not look like anything has happened. "Hmmm" you think to yourself "Maybe it did not work" You look down and at yourself and let out a scream of surprise. Your are no longer wearing pants, or underwear, or anything! Apparently that spell was supposed to make someone naked, but you obviously did something wrong and it backfired on you. You are not sure what to do. You can either leave through the front door and run back to your room, or try your luck with the ledge again.
13122212.title: You are naked

choices: A hand reaches through a window and pulls you into a room.
You plummet to the frothing sea below
131222121.content: Recognizing that someone might stumble on on you while unclothed, you turn for the ledge and climb out the window. It's much colder and windier than an hour ago, and you struggle to keep firm footing on the stone ledge. With a bit of luck however., you might make it. The cold nips at your...well... Parts as you shimmy along the wall, a very strange sight to behold for anyone who could be seeing you, you think. But your thinking has addled your sense of balance, and for a second you teeter on the brink of the parapet, struggling to regain your footing. Then...
131222121.title: Try the ledge

1312221212.content:
As you teeter on the brink of the ledge, a huge gust of wind blows knocking you off balance. You try to adjust your balance and stay on the ledge, however the changing wind makes this impossible and you fall towards the ocean. Doing the only thing you can think of, you reach out towards the ledge with your closest hand and manage to grab a hold of it.

You now dangle one handed from the ledge and you can hear the waves crashing into the cliff side below. You try to pull yourself up, however the loose grip makes this almost impossible. As you try, your hand starts to slide off the stone. You manage to swing your other hand onto the ledge, however you are not strong enough to pull yourself up. Your current position dangles you right in front of a large window.

Inside, Katie is bored out of her mind. She has been listening to the professor talk about the history of magic for what seems like hours. She cant take it any longer and decides to take a look outside at the worsening weather. As she looks out the window she lets out a quiet gasp. The last thing she expected to see was a naked man hanging in front of the window. She cant hide the grin that is forming on her face and she gives the naked man a wave.

Back on the ledge you are mortified. Here you are hanging on for your life, and sitting right in front of you is a woman who appears to be enjoying herself. The woman starts pointing at your member and starts silently laughing to herself, covering her mouth. This causes you to turn bright red with embarrassment.

The woman gets a wicked grin on her face and looks around the room, making sure no one is looking at her. Once she assures the coast is clear, she waves her wand, and points it towards you. You stare at her confused as nothing seems to have happened. You start to think this girl is messing with you when all of a sudden you feel something soft brush past your ear.

This is when you see the small bird feather floating through the air, controlled by the woman. She wickedly grins at you and moves the feather towards your armpit. She then starts moving her wand back and forth. The feather follows suit and starts brushing against your armpit. You bite your lip and try to pull yourself up however the laughter is making you weak, and one of your hands slip.

She moves the feather to your other armpit and start brushing it again. You manage to push the feather away from your armpit, and she moves it out of your reach. The woman just shrugs, and then moves it down towards your member. As the feather makes contact you start squirming. This sensation is much much worse than before and you try with all your might to reach the feather, but it is just out of your reach.

Not only are you being driven out of your mind, but the sensation is causing you to get excited. You turn bright red and the woman controlling the feather gives you a large grin. The sensation is causing you to lose focus and just as you are about to explode you lose your grip and fall towards the ocean. Just before you lose sight of the woman she gives you a wave goodbye with a triumphant smile on her face.

As you plunge into the cold water, your excitement immediately vanishes. You now have two options. You can either swim all the way back to the harbor in Bowerstone, or you can swim into a near by cave.
1312221212.title: You plummet to the frothing sea below

13122212122.content:
Well if you take the harbor, you would have to go through the center of town in the buff to get back to the castle. Not wanting to show the entire town your goods you decide to swim to the cave. You are a little nervous, not knowing where this cave will take you, but if there is a chance it can get you back into the castle without walking through town naked it is worth a shot.

You swim towards the cave, battling wave after wave after wave as the weather worsens. As you get closer to land you carefully make your way into the cave, making sure the waves don't send you crashing into the cliff. As you enter the cave you start to feel the current pick up. The further you get into the cave, the stronger the current gets. It is not long before the cave starts sloping downward and dragging you along with it.

You start to have second guesses about entering the cave. The strong current guarantees that this is going to be a one way trip and you have no clue where this will lead you. As you head deeper and deeper underground you pick up speed. Enchanted torches light the path as you speed down the river. It is not long before you see a opening in the cave.

Before you know what happens, you go flying off the river, and fall 20 feet to a deep pond below. As you surface, you look up and see the contents of the river being emptied into the pond. The current from the waterfall naturally sends you to the shoreline and you wade out of the pond. Taking a look around the room you see that you are in small cave. Enchanted lanterns line the walls. In the center of the cave is a pedestal emitting a blue light. Behind the pedestal is a large doorway. Not wanting to mess with the pedestal just yet, you walk up to the door and give it a large tug.

Locked... Looking around, you come to the conclusion that this glowing pedestal is your ticket out of here. You walk up to the pedestal and take a look. Although it appears to be empty, drawn on the pedestal are two hand prints. You nervously place your hands in line with them. A bright light blinds you. Slowly the light get duller and duller. As your vision returns.......
13122212122.title: Enter the cave

131222121221.content:
As your vision slowly returns the room looks the same. As you try and place your hands on the pedestal again, thinking you did something wrong, a realization comes to you. Your once free hands are now bound behind your back, bound by some sort of magical spell. You try with all your might to pull your hands apart, and even try a couple of spells that you hope will free your hands, however the spell is much stronger than anything you have ever come across and you give up and approach the door.

The large wooden door remains shut, however unlike before, a light blue light is pouring through the cracks of the door. Although the door is not yet open you seem to be on the right track. You look around the room to see what else you can do to open the door. Although most of the room looks similar, a light emitting from the ground next to the pond catches your eye.

The light makes two distinct footprints on the ground. You see a common theme here and like your hands, you place your feet onto the footprints.
131222121221.title: Your hands are tied

132.content:
Wanting to learn some new spells you figure the spell shop is the best place to start. You head down a series of streets until you come across an old looking shop. A dusty sign hanging above the entrance reads "Dragonbots Charms and Incantations". As you enter the shop, an aroma of smoke fills your nostrils.

You hear the crackling of a roaring fire coming from the side of the room. A small elderly man, who you assume is the owner, is fast asleep in front of the fire. Resting in a cozy looking chair, you decide to let him sleep and start browsing through the old looking book shelves. You leaf through a book called "Alizar's book of Basic Incantations" however it fails to produce any useful information and you continue looking. You are about to leave the shop when a very old looking book catches your eye.

In small gold letters, the title "Charms and Incantations of the Ages" is written on the cover of the book. There is no author listed on the book, which is odd, even for older books. The binding of the book is frail, and the pages are worn. As you carefully turn the pages, you see that multiple pages are torn and a couple of pages are missing.

Leafing through the pages, you don't see a single spell you have ever heard of. After each spell, the pronunciation is listed, followed by any additional instructions needed to preform the spells. Unfortunately you don't see any description of the spells. Only by using the title of the spell, and a bit of testing, will you be able to figure out what the spells do.

Remembering that you are dirt broke, you start to place the book back on the shelf when an idea comes to you. Looking at the man fast asleep, and looking at the wide open door, you make a decision.
132.title: Visit the Spellcrafting Shops

1321.content:
A sensation of desire overcomes you, and although you are generally a honest man, you need this book. You place the book in your cloak and silently walk out of the shop. Looking back you see the elderly man still fast asleep in his armchair. You grin, and stroll down the street. Deciding the center of town is not the safest place to practice magic you decide to leave the city.

As you enter the vast wilderness, located just outside the town, you take a seat on a comfy looking rock, and start leafing through the book.
1321.title: Steal the book

13212.content:
As you leaf through the first couple of pages, something catches your eye. Located on one of the pages is an old looking map. A map, however exciting, is not that odd of a sight. What really catches your attention is the little x, with the name Arthur written just inside of the vast forest outside of the town. This map knows your location!

A similar desire comes over you as before and you just have to find out where this map leads. You blindly follow the map through the woods, across rivers, and in and out multiple caverns. It does not take long to realize you are completely lost, however your curiosity overcomes you and you trek on. Just when you are about to give up and head home, something catches your eye.

You enter a small clearing and in the middle, emitting a bright white light, is a small portal. You enter the portal.

As you come out the other end you look around and see that you are in a small looking cottage. You turn around and the portal is gone! You start freaking out, not knowing where you are, or how you will get home when you hear a girly voice.

"It is about time you got here" the woman chuckles.

Startled, you spin around and come face to face with a young looking witch.
13212.title: You find a map

132122.content:
You turn around and take a look at the witch. She wears a long, black and purple dress that barely covers her thighs, and does a poor job at concealing her breasts. Along with her dress, she wears a large, stereotypical witches hat. She does not look like your typical, run of the mill witch though. With her flawless skin, long brown hair, and comforting smile on her face, she seems more like a princess that a witch.

As you look the witch over, you are completely oblivious to the two vines coming out of the ground behind you, moving like snakes through the air. Once they are high enough to reach your wrists, they dart at them with incredible speed, and before you have time to react they wrap themselves around your wrists. They start reeling themselves back into the ground, and although you fight to stay on your feet it is not long before they have you on your knees,

You can feel two more vines wrap themselves around your ankles, pinning them in place, and the vines around your arms pull tight, bringing your wrists to your ankles, leaving the entire front of your body completely vulnerable. You see a couple more vines raise out of the ground in front of you, and hover in front of you, moving through the air like a snake about to strike.

Distracted by the vines, you just now remember that the witch is still here. You look up at her and she just grins at you. "Hello, Welcome to my home. My name is Leona" she says. The tone in her voice is not serious, or stern, or really threatening at all. There is not a tone of mischief in her voice, she sounds very kind. She takes a seat in front of you, and you are just out of her reach. "And what is your name?" she asks.

Completely outraged that you have been captured like this, you completely ignore her question. "What on earth are you doing!" you yell at the lady. She just grins and nods at the vine that is facing her. The vine turn back towards you and with lighting speed, slashes across your shirt, cutting it in half. The vine quickly removes the pieces from your chest.

"So are you going to tell me your name? Or are you going to keep throwing a tantrum" she tease. You are outraged! "Listen up lady! I don't know who you think you are, but You can't just go around capturing people" The vine, like before, turns to Leona who gives it a quick nod. and the vine starts slashing away at your shorts, and it is not long before you are kneeling in just your briefs. You can feel the vines make quick work of your socks and shoes, and it is not long before those are gone as well.

"So how about that name" she asks in a very casual tone "Or should my little friends continue their work" she motions towards your briefs. "Ok just stop stealing my clothing!" you say, getting a little nervous. "My name is Arthur". You stare her down trying to get a good read on the situation. She is very calm, almost like she was just having a normal conversation with you. "It is a pleasure to meet you Arthur".

"Now are you going to tell me why you have tied me up?" you question her, hoping it will not lead to you losing any more clothing. "Oh why I did not do this, these vines have a mind of their own" she says motioning to the vine who is still slashing away at the shirt that is lying on the ground. "I would not worry though they are not dangerous, just a tad playful sometimes. Kind of like me" she says giving you a very seductive grin.

"Ok so why am I here?" you ask. She, yet again, does not give you a straightforward answer. "I was not the one who brought you here. You followed the map and came here on your own free will. I do not mind though, I am always exited to meet new people. Even ones as stubborn as you" she laughs as she says this.

"So Where are we?" you ask.

"We are in my own little world that I created. It is quite nice isn't it? I got tired of all of the violence in the old world, so I created this one where I could live in piece. I do grow lonely sometimes though, which is why I created the map. And you came to visit! That was so kind of you. Hey Stop that!" she shouts at a vine who was tugging at your briefs."Like I said, mind of their own, anyways where was I....

As she continues speaking, one of the vines that is holding your foot starts to stroke across your foot. The sensation is light, and you manage to keep your composure, but you do not know how long you can keep it as the vine tickles your foot. The other three vines holding your feet and wrists join in on the fun,"

You bite your lip trying to keep your cool in front of the witch, but the four vines are too much for you and you let out a giggle, followed by another and another. "hahah pleheehehs stop them!" you yell to the witch as the vines weave there ways through your ties and down your soles. "Hey I said stop!" The witch yells. The vines immediately stop.

"So anyways where was I, Oh yea! So we have a town down the road that some people have decided to live in. You of course are more than welcome to stay as long as you like. The town is ........:" As the Leona talks, you feel one of the vines graze itself along your thigh. You have to bite your lip to hold in the laughter, and Leona, who is looking at the sky as she speaks, does not seem to notice.

The vine slowly continues his torment, just slow enough so that you can keep in the laughter, but fast enough for it to still tickle. You are so distracted that you do not even see Leona stand up until she is standing right in front of you.
132122.title: She traps you

1321221.content:
"I am quite sorry but I need to go. Someone needs my help immediately" she turns to one of the vines "make sure you set him free ok?" she asks the vine. The vine shakes his head up and down. "Ok thanks!" she says running through the woods "I will be back soon" The vine turns towards you, and pokes your stomach, causing you to jerk. Another vine does the same to your other side, and you start to realize that you are not getting out of this anytime soon.

The two vines maneuver up to your head, and starts tickling your neck, causing a smirk to appear on your face. The two vines continue their torment for some time as they flick your ears, tickle your nose, and stroke your neck, keeping you just on the verge of laughing. You are not sure how long it will take for Leona, but it can't come soon enough.

One of the vines picks a cattail off of the ground and starts running it under your nose, causing you to snort, and sneeze at the same time. He then starts dragging it along the side of your neck, causing you to giggle. And if that wasn't enough, the vine near your foot picked up a leaf off of the ground and started stroking it along your sole.

As the vines torment you, you see a large bird land, eat something off of the ground, and the fly away as quickly as he came. You were not focused on the bird though, but the large feather that he left behind.This feather has to be one of the largest, stiffest feather you have ever seen, Your hearts drops as you see one of the vines, also noticing the feather, heading towards it.

The vine soon returns wielding the feather like a sword. The third vine brings the feather up to your chest, and starts flicking your nipples with it. This is the last straw as you start thrashing around, squealing like a girl, as the vines play with their new toy. The feather tickling your nipples is by far more ticklish than anything you have ever felt in your entire life, and you try with all of your might to avoid it, or break free of the vines, or do anything you can to stop it, but it is no use.

The vine with the feather eventually stops tickling your nipples, and moves down to your thighs where he starts sawing the feather between your legs, You try and spread your legs apart to avoid the feather, but two more vines pop out of the ground and hold your legs in place, Although this sensation is driving you insane, it does not take long before the vine gets bored of this.

Two more vines pop out of the ground, grab onto the legs of your briefs, and pulls it out, creating a gap between the underwear and your leg. The feather then is stuck up your underwear, and is flicked across on of your balls. You thought your strength was gone, but this gave you a burst of energy like nothing else you ever felt as you press against your legs, trying to break free of the feathers torment.

This new found burst of energy was actually enough to free your legs for a moment, but the vines quickly recovered as more vines wrapped around your legs and arms. The vine with the feather flicked your balls again, and this time you were bound tight and there was nothing you could do besides scream out in ticklish agony as the feather danced across your balls.

The vines have found there new favorite spot as two more vines squeeze down your underwear and starts tickling the top of your balls. It is not long before you start to get hard from all of this tickling. Two more vines start tickling your nipples again, and you thrash around in ticklish agony, with nothing you can do.
1321221.title: She has to go

13212211.content:
It only takes Leona about twenty minutes to return, but it seems like an eternity. In your ticklish agony, you do not even see her approaching you until she is only a couple feet away. "You guys, I thought I told you to let him go" Leona says, trying to scold the plants, but there is not hiding the amused tone in her voice and the smirk on her face.

One of the vines moves over towards her, and lowers itself. The smirk does not disappear from her face and the vine raises its head and looks at her. "Well I have to admit, this is the first time I have seen a smile on his face since I have gotten here" she jokes looking at you as you are still being attacked by the vines, who have are now trying to push their way into your armpits.

"Please let me go!" you scream as one of the vines managed to fit itself in between your arm and your side, and is now wiggling itself in the hollows of your armpit. Leona does not say anything, and just stares at you and the vines, as if trying to decide what to do. "Oh alright, you can have 10 more minutes" she says turning to the vines "but play nice"

Before you can say another word, one of the vines covers your mouth, preventing you from talking her out of this. "Have fun!" Leona says waving to you and she turns around and walks back inside. The vines, realizing they only have a limited time left with their toy, intensify the tickling. More vines come out of the ground. Two Vines dart in each of your armpits, wiggling around in your pits. No less than 10 vines starts scribbling along your feet and gliding in between your toes. More vines than you can count start gliding along your belly, poking and prodding in your bellybutton. 6 vines join the vines in your underwear and start tickling your balls and your penis, and you feel multiple vines attacking your thighs, and the backs of your knees.

If you thought it was bad before, that was noting compared to what you are feeling now. Almost every inch of your body is being tickled, and you can not do anything to prevent it. Your squeals of laughter have vanished and have been relapsed by silent laughter as you are no longer able to make any noises. You manage to last what feels like an eternity, but in reality is probably only a couple minutes, before you start seeing spots. You quickly pass out.

When you awaken, you are......
13212211.title: Leona Returns

132122111.content:
Megan was working her usual shift at the "The Snicker Inn", the town's only Tavern, expecting a usual, boring shirt. She was halfway through her rounds when she hears the bell signaling that someone has entered the Inn. She quickly walks to the front desk, and turns towards the customer to greet them, But the sound that comes out of her mouth is not a greeting.

Instead a loud snort escapes her mouth, the kind that forces itself out of ones mouth when trying to suppress a laugh. Her customer, or customers should I say, were none other than the famous Leona, accompanied by a naked man, passed out in her arms. Leona tells Megan about the story of her visitor, who had a little to much fun with her plants, and how after passing out, the plants shredded his last piece of clothing. With no male clothing of her own, Leona had no choice but to bring him here, naked.

Megan told her it was not problem, telling Leona that in the morning she would help him find some clothing to wear. She leads Leona to a empty bedroom, sneaking as many glances at the naked man as she could, and Leona sets you down on the bed before she thanks Megan one more time, and leaves. Megan, on the other hand, does not leave, but instead takes a seat in a nearby chair and enjoys her her view.

Eventually she decides she has to get back to work, and stands up and heads to the door. Just before she leaves, she gets a devious idea. She walks back towards your unconscious, naked body, and gathers up all of the bed covers, the curtains, the towels, and anything else that this naked man could use to cover himself in the morning. "This should make his morning a bit more exciting, and mine" she says with a wicked grin on her face. She then walks out of his room, with a large grin on her face.



You awaken some time later. You must have been out for a long time as the morning light pours through your open window, shining on your naked body. As you open your eyes and take a look down, you leap out of your bed realizing you are completely naked. You frantically search around the room, searching for something to hide your nakedness, but you find nothing. No sheet, no blankets, no towels, there are not even curtains to keep passersby from looking into your room.
132122111.title: In a bed

1321221111.content:
You have no choice but to head out of your room and look for some clothing.You crack open your door, and poke your head out to make sure that no one is around. Once you verify that the coast is clear, you creep out into the hallway. You check almost every door in the hallway, but they all seem to be locked. You start to get nervous, feeling more exposed than ever as a cool breeze rushes past your bare bottom.

You start to wonder if things could get any worse when all of a sudden you hear someone snicker behind you. You quickly spin around and come face to face with a short, petite girl wearing a dark green dress with a brown corset. She looks rather fatigued, but has a smile on her face. "You happy to see me" she seductive says, trying to hold back her laughter. You look down and realize that by turning around, you have exposed your... member. Your face turns beat red and your quickly cover up.

"So, for what reason do I have the pleasure of standing in front of such a..... natural man" she asks. The tone in her is of utter delight as she speaks to you. You stumble over your words, trying to find the words to explain yourself. Unfortunately, all that comes out is "Can I have some clothing?" A schoolgirl giggle escapes her mouth as you blurt this out.

"Hmm... Perhaps..... But I cant just give them away, you will have to work for it"

"What do you mean?"
1321221111.title: Look for clothing

13212211111.content:
She stays silent for a moment, as if trying to decide what to do with you. After a few moments, a sly grin appears on her face and she gives you a look that sends shivers down her spine. "Oh that is good" she says to herself. "We have have a pair of stockades in the tavern, We do not use it for real criminals, its more of a publicity stunt. Spend a few hours in the stocks, and I will give you some clothing"

You contemplate her offer. "I don't suppose you would be willing to give me some clothing before I got locked in the stocks?" You ask her hopeful. Your tone of fear is obvious, and she laughs, knowing she has you right were she wants you. "I don't think so. A naked man in the stocks, I will make a killing. Now you can accept my offer, or continue to strut around town naked. It is up to you"

You know that you have been beat, and you accept her offer. She leads you down the hallway. As you pass the front door, a cool breeze rushes past your bare bottom, reminding you of your vulnerability. She leads you down another hallway, and into the tavern. The tavern is small, with just a few tables, and a small bar in the corner. On the other side, across from the bar, is the stocks.

You reluctantly take a seat and lay your legs out straight. She locks your feet in, and then motions for you to put your hands above your head. You face goes red with embarrassment as you uncover your privates. She quickly locks your hands above your head. "Well I have to get back to work. Get ready, rush hour should be here soon" she teases.
13212211111.title: Trapped in the stockades

choices: The guards stun you with their shields and have their way with you.
13213.content:
You could have sworn that old man knew you took the book, even though he was asleep. No way you'd managed to steal that huge book out from under his wrinkled nose without him noticing, since normally you're not much of a thief. But no matter, you got the book and escaped the store without anything bad happening. You sit down on a smooth rock outside of town and take out the spellbook. An unblinking eye adorns the book's musty cover, inviting you to delve inside.

"Hey you! Stop right there!" You gasp and look up. Two well armored Bowerstone City Guards have approached you, each holding heavy shields; which are excellent for blocking magical as well as physical attacks. They carry no other weapons, but you know the steel shields can deliver a devastating blow. Although the only part of their body you can see are their eyes, it's obvious by their molded breastplates and voices that they are female.

"What's that you've got there?", the one with blue eyes asks. "Just a storybook...", you reply, hoping neither notice your arcane book. Too late. "That's no common book, it's an ancient wizard tome!", the green-eyed guard says. "Probably stolen, too!" Looks like there's no escaping this one. But armed with only a rudimentary knowledge of spells, such as "flames" and "light flash", you don't stand a chance.

But wait! Your spellbook! As the guards approach to capture you or worse, you leaf through the book to a random page, which shows a person dissapearing and has an incantation written below it. It's dangerous, and might not work, but you have to try this invisibility spell.
13213.title: You are interupted

132131.content:
